Abdominales.name: Flat Bench Tumbado Elevación de Piernas
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie with your back flat on a bench and your legs extended in front of you off the end.
Place your hands either under your glutes with your palms down or by the sides holding on to the bench. This will be your starting position.
As you keep your legs extended, straight as possible with your knees slightly bent but locked raise your legs until they make a 90-degree angle with the floor. Exhale as you perform this portion of the movement and hold the contraction at the top for a second.
Now, as you inhale, slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie with your back flat on a bench and your legs extended in front of you off the end.
Place your hands either under your glutes with your palms down or by the sides holding on to the bench. This will be your starting position.
As you keep your legs extended, straight as possible with your knees slightly bent but locked raise your legs until they make a 90-degree angle with the floor. Exhale as you perform this portion of the movement and hold the contraction at the top for a second.
Now, as you inhale, slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie with your Espalda flat on a bench and your Piernas extended in Frontal of you off the end. Place your hands either under your Glúteos with your palms down or by the Laterals holding on to the bench. This will be your starting position. As you keep your Piernas extended, straight as possible with your knees slightly bent but locked Elevación your Piernas until they make a 90-degree angle with the Suelo. Exhale as you perform this portion of the movement and hold the contraction at the top for a second. Now, as you inhale, sBajoly Bajoer your Piernas Espalda down to the starting position.

Abdominales.name: Frog Abdominaless
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie with your back flat on the floor (or exercise mat) and your legs extended in front of you.
Now bend at the knees and place your outer thighs by the floor (or mat) as you make the soles of your feet touch each other.
Now try pushing both soles and bringing them up as near you as possible while you keep the outer thighs on the floor (or at least almost touching it). Tip: In this position your legs should create a diamond shape.
Now, cross your arms in front of you by touching the opposite shoulders. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale flatten your lower back to the floor while curling the torso upwards. Tip: This will be like performing the first 1/4 movement of a sit up. Hold at the top position for a second.
As you inhale, slowly lower back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie with your back flat on the floor (or exercise mat) and your legs extended in front of you.
Now bend at the knees and place your outer thighs by the floor (or mat) as you make the soles of your feet touch each other.
Now try pushing both soles and bringing them up as near you as possible while you keep the outer thighs on the floor (or at least almost touching it). Tip: In this position your legs should create a diamond shape.
Now, cross your arms in front of you by touching the opposite shoulders. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale flatten your lower back to the floor while curling the torso upwards. Tip: This will be like performing the first 1/4 movement of a sit up. Hold at the top position for a second.
As you inhale, slowly lower back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie with your Espalda flat on the Suelo (or exercise mat) and your Piernas extended in Frontal of you. Now bend at the knees and place your outer tAltos by the Suelo (or mat) as you make the soles of your feet touch each other. Now try pushing both soles and bringing them up as near you as possible while you keep the outer tAltos on the Suelo (or at least almost touching it). Tip: In this position your Piernas should create a diamond shape. Now, cross your arms in Frontal of you by touching the opposite Hombros. This will be your starting position. As you exhale flatten your Bajoer Espalda to the Suelo while Curling the torso upwards. Tip: This will be like performing the first 1/4 movement of a sit up. Hold at the top position for a second. As you inhale, sBajoly Bajoer Espalda to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Gorilla Chin/crunch
Abdominales.instructions:
Hang from a chin-up bar using an underhand grip (palms facing you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width.
Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle so that the calves are parallel to the floor while the thighs remain perpendicular to it. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale, pull yourself up while crunching your knees up at the same time until your knees are at chest level. You will stop going up as soon as your nose is at the same level as the bar. Tip: When you get to this point you should also be finishing the crunch at the same time.
Slowly start to inhale as you return to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Hang from a chin-up bar using an underhand grip (palms facing you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width.
Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle so that the calves are parallel to the floor while the thighs remain perpendicular to it. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale, pull yourself up while crunching your knees up at the same time until your knees are at chest level. You will stop going up as soon as your nose is at the same level as the bar. Tip: When you get to this point you should also be finishing the crunch at the same time.
Slowly start to inhale as you return to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Colgado from a Dominada Supina bar using an underhand grip (palms facing you) that is slightly wider than Hombro width. Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle so that the calves are parallel to the Suelo while the tAltos remain perpendicular to it. This will be your starting position. As you exhale, pull yourself up while Crunching your knees up at the same time until your knees are at Pecho level. You will stop going up as soon as your nose is at the same level as the bar. Tip: When you get to this point you should also be finishing the Crunch at the same time. SBajoly start to inhale as you return to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Hanging Elevación de Piernas
Abdominales.instructions:
Cuelgue de una barra de mentón con ambos brazos extendidos a la longitud de los brazos en la parte superior de usted usando un agarre ancho o un agarre medio. Las piernas deben estar rectas hacia abajo con la pelvis ligeramente hacia atrás. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Levanta las piernas hasta que el torso forme un ángulo de 90 grados con las piernas. Exhale mientras realiza este movimiento y mantenga la contracción durante un segundo más o menos.
Vuelva lentamente a la posición inicial mientras inhala.
Repita la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Hang from a chin-up bar with both arms extended at arms length in top of you using either a wide grip or a medium grip. The legs should be straight down with the pelvis rolled slightly backwards. This will be your starting position.
Raise your legs until the torso makes a 90-degree angle with the legs. Exhale as you perform this movement and hold the contraction for a second or so.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Colgado from a Dominada Supina bar with both arms extended at arms length in top of you using either a Agarre Ancho or a medium grip. The Piernas should be straight down with the pelvis rolled slightly Espaldawards. This will be your starting position. Elevación your Piernas until the torso makes a 90-degree angle with the Piernas. Exhale as you perform this movement and hold the contraction for a second or so. Go Espalda sBajoly to the starting position as you breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Colgadoing Pike
Abdominales.instructions:
Hang from a chin-up bar with your legs and feet together using an overhand grip (palms facing away from you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width. Tip: You may use wrist wraps in order to facilitate holding on to the bar.
Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle and bring the upper legs forward so that the calves are perpendicular to the floor while the thighs remain parallel to it. This will be your starting position.
Pull your legs up as you exhale until you almost touch your shins with the bar above you. Tip: Try to straighten your legs as much as possible while at the top.
Lower your legs as slowly as possible until you reach the starting position. Tip: Avoid swinging and using momentum at all times.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Hang from a chin-up bar with your legs and feet together using an overhand grip (palms facing away from you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width. Tip: You may use wrist wraps in order to facilitate holding on to the bar.
Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle and bring the upper legs forward so that the calves are perpendicular to the floor while the thighs remain parallel to it. This will be your starting position.
Pull your legs up as you exhale until you almost touch your shins with the bar above you. Tip: Try to straighten your legs as much as possible while at the top.
Lower your legs as slowly as possible until you reach the starting position. Tip: Avoid swinging and using momentum at all times.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Colgado from a Dominada Supina bar with your Piernas and feet together using an overhand grip (palms facing away from you) that is slightly wider than Hombro width. Tip: You may use Muñeca wraps in order to facilitate holding on to the bar. Now bend your knees at a 90 degree angle and bring the upper Piernas forward so that the calves are perpendicular to the Suelo while the tAltos remain parallel to it. This will be your starting position. Pull your Piernas up as you exhale until you almost touch your shins with the bar above you. Tip: Try to straighten your Piernas as much as possible while at the top. Bajoer your Piernas as sBajoly as possible until you reach the starting position. Tip: Avoid swinging and using momentum at all times. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Jackknife Abdominales
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie flat on the floor (or exercise mat) on your back with your arms extended straight back behind your head and your legs extended also. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale, bend at the waist while simultaneously raising your legs and arms to meet in a jackknife position. Tip: The legs should be extended and lifted at approximately a 35-45 degree angle from the floor and the arms should be extended and parallel to your legs. The upper torso should be off the floor.
While inhaling, lower your arms and legs back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie flat on the floor (or exercise mat) on your back with your arms extended straight back behind your head and your legs extended also. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale, bend at the waist while simultaneously raising your legs and arms to meet in a jackknife position. Tip: The legs should be extended and lifted at approximately a 35-45 degree angle from the floor and the arms should be extended and parallel to your legs. The upper torso should be off the floor.
While inhaling, lower your arms and legs back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie flat on the Suelo (or exercise mat) on your Espalda with your arms extended straight Espalda behind your head and your Piernas extended also. This will be your starting position. As you exhale, bend at the waist while simultaneously raising your Piernas and arms to meet in a jackknife position. Tip: The Piernas should be extended and lifted at approximately a 35-45 degree angle from the Suelo and the arms should be extended and parallel to your Piernas. The upper torso should be off the Suelo. While inhaling, Bajoer your arms and Piernas Espalda to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Janda Abdominales
Abdominales.instructions:
Position your body on the floor in the basic sit-up position; knees to a ninety degree angle with feet flat on the floor and arms either crossed over your chest or to the sides. This will be your starting position.
As you strongly tighten your glutes and hamstrings, fill your lungs with air and in a slow (three to six second count) ascent, slowly exhale. Tip: It is important to tighten the glutes and hamstrings as this will cause the hip flexors to be inactivated in a process called reciprocal inhibition, which basically means that opposite muscles to the contracted ones will relax.
As you inhale, slowly go back in a controlled manner to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Position your body on the floor in the basic sit-up position; knees to a ninety degree angle with feet flat on the floor and arms either crossed over your chest or to the sides. This will be your starting position.
As you strongly tighten your glutes and hamstrings, fill your lungs with air and in a slow (three to six second count) ascent, slowly exhale. Tip: It is important to tighten the glutes and hamstrings as this will cause the hip flexors to be inactivated in a process called reciprocal inhibition, which basically means that opposite muscles to the contracted ones will relax.
As you inhale, slowly go back in a controlled manner to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Position your body on the Suelo in the basic Abdominales position; knees to a ninety degree angle with feet flat on the Suelo and arms either crossed over your Pecho or to the Laterals. This will be your starting position. As you strongly tighten your Glúteos and hamstrings, fill your lungs with air and in a sBajo (three to six second count) ascent, sBajoly exhale. Tip: It is important to tighten the Glúteos and hamstrings as this will cause the Cadera flexors to be inactivated in a process called reciprocal inhibition, which basically means that opposite Muslos to the contracted ones will relax. As you inhale, sBajoly go Espalda in a controlled manner to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Pesa Rusa Figure 8
Abdominales.instructions:
Coloque una pesa rusa entre las piernas y adopte una postura más ancha que el ancho de los hombros. Inclínate empujando el trasero hacia fuera y manteniendo la espalda plana.
Coge una pesa rusa y pásala a la otra mano entre las piernas. La mano receptora debe llegar desde detrás de las piernas. Vuelva atrás y adelante para varias repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Place one kettlebell between your legs and take a wider than shoulder width stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your back flat.
Pick up a kettlebell and pass it to your other hand between your legs. The receiving hand should reach from behind the legs. Go back and forth for several repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Place one Pesa Rusa between your Piernas and take a wider than Hombro width stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your Espalda flat. Pick up a Pesa Rusa and pass it to your other hand between your Piernas. The receiving hand should reach from behind the Piernas. Go Espalda and forth for several repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Pesa Rusa Pass Between The Piernas
Abdominales.instructions:
Coloca una pesa rusa entre las piernas y adopta una postura cómoda. Inclínate empujando el trasero hacia fuera y manteniendo la espalda plana.
Coge una pesa rusa y pásala a la otra mano entre las piernas, en forma de "W". Vuelva atrás y adelante para varias repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Place one kettlebell between your legs and take a comfortable stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your back flat.
Pick up a kettlebell and pass it to your other hand between your legs, in the fashion of a "W". Go back and forth for several repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Place one Pesa Rusa between your Piernas and take a comfortable stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your Espalda flat. Pick up a Pesa Rusa and pass it to your other hand between your Piernas, in the fashion of a "W". Go Espalda and forth for several repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Pesa Rusa Windmill
Abdominales.instructions:
Place a kettlebell in front of your lead foot and clean and press it overhead with your opposite arm. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the legs and hips as you pull the kettlebell towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. Press it overhead by extending the elbow.
Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, push your butt out in the direction of the locked out kettlebell. Turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the locked out kettlebell. Bending at the hip to one side, sticking your butt out, slowly lean until you can touch the floor with your free hand. Keep your eyes on the kettlebell that you hold over your head at all times.
Pause for a second after reaching the ground and reverse the motion back to the starting position.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Place a kettlebell in front of your lead foot and clean and press it overhead with your opposite arm. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the legs and hips as you pull the kettlebell towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. Press it overhead by extending the elbow.
Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, push your butt out in the direction of the locked out kettlebell. Turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the locked out kettlebell. Bending at the hip to one side, sticking your butt out, slowly lean until you can touch the floor with your free hand. Keep your eyes on the kettlebell that you hold over your head at all times.
Pause for a second after reaching the ground and reverse the motion back to the starting position.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Place a Pesa Rusa in Frontal of your lead foot and Cargada and Press it Sobre la Cabeza with your opposite arm. Cargada the Pesa Rusa to your Hombro by extending through the Piernas and Caderas as you pull the Pesa Rusa towards your Hombros. Rotate your Muñeca as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. Press it Sobre la Cabeza by extending the elbow. Keeping the Pesa Rusa locked out at all times, push your butt out in the direction of the locked out Pesa Rusa. Turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the locked out Pesa Rusa. Bending at the Cadera to one Lateral, sticking your butt out, sBajoly lean until you can touch the Suelo with your free hand. Keep your eyes on the Pesa Rusa that you hold over your head at all times. Pause for a second after reaching the ground and Inverso the motion Espalda to the starting position.

Abdominales.name: Knee/cadera Elevación On Parallel Bars
Abdominales.instructions:
Position your body on the vertical leg raise bench so that your forearms are resting on the pads next to the torso and holding on to the handles. Your arms will be bent at a 90 degree angle.
The torso should be straight with the lower back pressed against the pad of the machine and the legs extended pointing towards the floor. This will be your starting position.
Now as you breathe out, lift your legs up as you keep them extended. Continue this movement until your legs are roughly parallel to the floor and then hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Do not use any momentum or swinging as you perform this exercise.
Slowly go back to the starting position as you breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Position your body on the vertical leg raise bench so that your forearms are resting on the pads next to the torso and holding on to the handles. Your arms will be bent at a 90 degree angle.
The torso should be straight with the lower back pressed against the pad of the machine and the legs extended pointing towards the floor. This will be your starting position.
Now as you breathe out, lift your legs up as you keep them extended. Continue this movement until your legs are roughly parallel to the floor and then hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Do not use any momentum or swinging as you perform this exercise.
Slowly go back to the starting position as you breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Position your body on the vertical Elevación de Piernas bench so that your foPosteriorms are resting on the pads next to the torso and holding on to the handles. Your arms will be bent at a 90 degree angle. The torso should be straight with the Bajoer Espalda Pressed against the pad of the Máquina and the Piernas extended pointing towards the Suelo. This will be your starting position. Now as you breathe out, lift your Piernas up as you keep them extended. Continue this movement until your Piernas are roughly parallel to the Suelo and then hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Do not use any momentum or swinging as you perform this exercise. SBajoly go Espalda to the starting position as you breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Arrodillado Polea Crunch With Alternando Oblique Twists
Abdominales.instructions:
Connect a rope attachment to a high pulley cable and position a mat on the floor in front of it.
Grab the rope with both hands and kneel approximately two feet back from the tower.
Position the rope behind your head with your hands by your ears.
Keep your hands in the same place, contract your abs and pull downward on the rope in a crunching movement until your elbows reach your knees.
Pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting position.
Repeat the same downward movement until you're halfway down, at which time you'll begin rotating one of your elbows to the opposite knee.
Again, pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting position.
Repeat the same movement as before, but alternate the other elbow to the opposite knee.
Continue this series of movements to failure.
Abdominales.name_en: Kneeling Cable Crunch With Alternating Oblique Twists
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Connect a rope attachment to a high pulley cable and position a mat on the floor in front of it.
Grab the rope with both hands and kneel approximately two feet back from the tower.
Position the rope behind your head with your hands by your ears.
Keep your hands in the same place, contract your abs and pull downward on the rope in a crunching movement until your elbows reach your knees.
Pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting position.
Repeat the same downward movement until you're halfway down, at which time you'll begin rotating one of your elbows to the opposite knee.
Again, pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting position.
Repeat the same movement as before, but alternate the other elbow to the opposite knee.
Continue this series of movements to failure.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Connect a rope attachment to a Alto pulley Polea and position a mat on the Suelo in Frontal of it. Grab the rope with both hands and kneel approximately two feet Espalda from the tower. Position the rope behind your head with your hands by your ears. Keep your hands in the same place, contract your abs and pull downward on the rope in a Crunching movement until your elbows reach your knees. Pause brieAperturas at the bottom and rise up in a sBajo and controlled manner until you reach the starting position. Repeat the same downward movement until you're halfway down, at which time you'll begin rotating one of your elbows to the opposite knee. Again, pause brieAperturas at the bottom and rise up in a sBajo and controlled manner until you reach the starting position. Repeat the same movement as before, but alternate the other elbow to the opposite knee. Continue this series of movements to failure.

Abdominales.name: Landmine 180's
Abdominales.instructions:
Position a bar into a landmine or securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate weight.
Raise the bar from the floor, taking it to shoulder height with both hands with your arms extended in front of you. Adopt a wide stance. This will be your starting position.
Perform the movement by rotating the trunk and hips as you swing the weight all the way down to one side. Keep your arms extended throughout the exercise.
Reverse the motion to swing the weight all the way to the opposite side.
Continue alternating the movement until the set is complete.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Position a bar into a landmine or securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate weight.
Raise the bar from the floor, taking it to shoulder height with both hands with your arms extended in front of you. Adopt a wide stance. This will be your starting position.
Perform the movement by rotating the trunk and hips as you swing the weight all the way down to one side. Keep your arms extended throughout the exercise.
Reverse the motion to swing the weight all the way to the opposite side.
Continue alternating the movement until the set is complete.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Position a bar into a Landmine or securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate weight. Elevación the bar from the Suelo, taking it to Hombro height with both hands with your arms extended in Frontal of you. Adopt a wide stance. This will be your starting position. Perform the movement by rotating the trunk and Caderas as you swing the weight all the way down to one Lateral. Keep your arms extended throughout the exercise. Inverso the motion to swing the weight all the way to the opposite Lateral. Continue Alternando the movement until the set is complete.

Abdominales.name: Pierna Pull-in
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie on an exercise mat with your legs extended and your hands either palms facing down next to you or under your glutes. Tip: My preference is with the hands next to me. This will be your starting position.
Bend your knees and pull your upper thighs into your midsection as you breathe out. Continue the motion until your knees are around chest level. Contract your abs as you execute this movement and hold for a second at the top. Tip: As you perform the motion, the lower legs (calves) should always remain parallel to the floor.
Return to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie on an exercise mat with your legs extended and your hands either palms facing down next to you or under your glutes. Tip: My preference is with the hands next to me. This will be your starting position.
Bend your knees and pull your upper thighs into your midsection as you breathe out. Continue the motion until your knees are around chest level. Contract your abs as you execute this movement and hold for a second at the top. Tip: As you perform the motion, the lower legs (calves) should always remain parallel to the floor.
Return to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie on an exercise mat with your Piernas extended and your hands either palms facing down next to you or under your Glúteos. Tip: My preference is with the hands next to me. This will be your starting position. Bend your knees and pull your upper tAltos into your midsection as you breathe out. Continue the motion until your knees are around Pecho level. Contract your abs as you execute this movement and hold for a second at the top. Tip: As you perform the motion, the Bajoer Piernas (calves) should always remain parallel to the Suelo. Return to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Curl en la Parte Inferior de la Espalda
Abdominales.instructions:
Acuéstate boca abajo con los brazos a los lados. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Usando los músculos de la espalda baja, extiende la columna levantando el pecho del suelo. No uses los brazos para empujarte hacia arriba. Mantén la cabeza en alto durante el movimiento. Repita de 10 a 20 repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie on your stomach with your arms out to your sides. This will be your starting position.
Using your lower back muscles, extend your spine lifting your chest off of the ground. Do not use your arms to push yourself up. Keep your head up during the movement. Repeat for 10-20 repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie on your stomach with your arms out to your Laterals. This will be your starting position. Using your Bajoer Espalda Muslos, extend your spine lifting your Pecho off of the ground. Do not use your arms to push yourself up. Keep your head up during the movement. Repeat for 10-20 repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Balón Medicinal de Giro Completo
Abdominales.instructions:
Para este ejercicio necesitarás un balón medicinal y un compañero. Párese espalda con espalda con su pareja, espaciados 2-3 pies de distancia. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Sostenga la pelota delante del maletero. Abre las caderas y gira los hombros al mismo tiempo que tu pareja.
Para una rotación completa, usted y su compañero deben girar en la misma dirección, es decir, en sentido contrario a las agujas del reloj.
Pásale la pelota a tu compañero, y ahora ambos pueden girar en la dirección opuesta para repetir el procedimiento.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
For this exercise you will need a medicine ball and a partner. Stand back to back with your partner, spaced 2-3 feet apart. This will be your starting position.
Hold the ball in front of the trunk. Open the hips and turn the shoulders at the same time as your partner.
For full rotation, you and your partner should twist in the same direction, i.e. counter-clockwise.
Pass the ball to your partner, and both of you can now twist in the opposite direction to repeat the procedure.
Abdominales.instructions_es: For this exercise you will need a medicine ball and a partner. Stand Espalda to Espalda with your partner, spaced 2-3 feet apart. This will be your starting position. Hold the ball in Frontal of the trunk. Open the Caderas and turn the Hombros at the same time as your partner. For full rotation, you and your partner should twist in the same direction, i.e. counter-clockwise. Pass the ball to your partner, and both of you can now twist in the opposite direction to repeat the procedure.

Abdominales.name: Crujidos Oblicuos
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie flat on the floor with your lower back pressed to the ground. For this exercise, you will need to put one hand beside your head and the other to the side against the floor.
Make sure your feet are elevated and resting on a flat surface.
Now lift the shoulder in which your hand is touching your head.
Simply elevate your shoulder and body upward until you touch your knee. For example, if you have your right hand besides your head, then you want to elevate your body upwards until your right elbow touches your left knee. The same variation can be applied doing the inverse and using your left elbow to touch your right knee.
After your knee touches your elbow, lower your body until you have reached the starting position.
Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (upward) part of the exercise.
Continue alternating in this manner until all of the recommended repetitions for each side have been completed.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie flat on the floor with your lower back pressed to the ground. For this exercise, you will need to put one hand beside your head and the other to the side against the floor.
Make sure your feet are elevated and resting on a flat surface.
Now lift the shoulder in which your hand is touching your head.
Simply elevate your shoulder and body upward until you touch your knee. For example, if you have your right hand besides your head, then you want to elevate your body upwards until your right elbow touches your left knee. The same variation can be applied doing the inverse and using your left elbow to touch your right knee.
After your knee touches your elbow, lower your body until you have reached the starting position.
Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (upward) part of the exercise.
Continue alternating in this manner until all of the recommended repetitions for each side have been completed.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie flat on the Suelo with your Bajoer Espalda Pressed to the ground. For this exercise, you will need to put one hand beLateral your head and the other to the Lateral against the Suelo. Make sure your feet are elevated and resting on a flat surface. Now lift the Hombro in which your hand is touching your head. Simply elevate your Hombro and body upward until you touch your knee. For example, if you have your right hand beLaterals your head, then you want to elevate your body upwards until your right elbow touches your left knee. The same variation can be applied doing the inverse and using your left elbow to touch your right knee. After your knee touches your elbow, Bajoer your body until you have reached the starting position. Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (Bajoering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (upward) part of the exercise. Continue Alternando in this manner until all of the recommended repetitions for each Lateral have been completed.

Abdominales.name: Oblique Crunches - On The Suelo
Abdominales.instructions:
Start out by lying on your right side with your legs lying on top of each other. Make sure your knees are bent a little bit.
Place your left hand behind your head.
Once you are in this set position, begin by moving your left elbow up as you would perform a normal crunch except this time the main emphasis is on your obliques.
Crunch as high as you can, hold the contraction for a second and then slowly drop back down into the starting position.
Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (elevation) part of the exercise.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Start out by lying on your right side with your legs lying on top of each other. Make sure your knees are bent a little bit.
Place your left hand behind your head.
Once you are in this set position, begin by moving your left elbow up as you would perform a normal crunch except this time the main emphasis is on your obliques.
Crunch as high as you can, hold the contraction for a second and then slowly drop back down into the starting position.
Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (elevation) part of the exercise.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Start out by Recostado on your right Lateral with your Piernas Recostado on top of each other. Make sure your knees are bent a little bit. Place your left hand behind your head. Once you are in this set position, begin by moving your left elbow up as you would perform a normal Crunch except this time the main emphasis is on your obliques. Crunch as Alto as you can, hold the contraction for a second and then sBajoly drop Espalda down into the starting position. Remember to breathe in during the eccentric (Bajoering) part of the exercise and to breathe out during the concentric (elevation) part of the exercise.

Abdominales.name: Un Brazo Alto-pulley Polea Lateral Bends
Abdominales.instructions:
Connect a standard handle to a tower. Move cable to highest pulley position.
Stand with side to cable. With one hand, reach up and grab handle with underhand grip.
Pull down cable until elbow touches your side and the handle is by your shoulder.
Position feet hip-width apart. Place free hand on hip to help gauge pivot point.
Keep arm in static position. Contract oblique to bring the weight down in a side crunch.
Once you reach maximum contraction, slowly release the weight to the starting position. The weight stack should never be unloaded in a resting position. The aim is constant tension during the set.
Repeat to failure.
Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Connect a standard handle to a tower. Move cable to highest pulley position.
Stand with side to cable. With one hand, reach up and grab handle with underhand grip.
Pull down cable until elbow touches your side and the handle is by your shoulder.
Position feet hip-width apart. Place free hand on hip to help gauge pivot point.
Keep arm in static position. Contract oblique to bring the weight down in a side crunch.
Once you reach maximum contraction, slowly release the weight to the starting position. The weight stack should never be unloaded in a resting position. The aim is constant tension during the set.
Repeat to failure.
Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Connect a Estándar handle to a tower. Move Polea to Altoest pulley position. Stand with Lateral to Polea. With one hand, reach up and grab handle with underhand grip. Pull down Polea until elbow touches your Lateral and the handle is by your Hombro. Position feet Cadera-width apart. Place free hand on Cadera to help gauge pivot point. Keep arm in static position. Contract oblique to bring the weight down in a Lateral Crunch. Once you reach maximum contraction, sBajoly release the weight to the starting position. The weight stack should never be unloaded in a resting position. The aim is constant tension during the set. Repeat to failure. Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite Lateral.

Abdominales.name: Un Brazo Medicine Ball Slam
Abdominales.instructions:
Start in a standing position with a staggered, athletic stance. Hold a medicine ball in one hand, on the same side as your back leg. This will be your starting position.
Begin by winding the arm, raising the medicine ball above your head. As you do so, extend through the hips, knees, and ankles to load up for the slam.
At peak extension, flex the shoulders, spine, and hips to throw the ball hard into the ground directly in front of you.
Catch the ball on the bounce and continue for the desired number of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Start in a standing position with a staggered, athletic stance. Hold a medicine ball in one hand, on the same side as your back leg. This will be your starting position.
Begin by winding the arm, raising the medicine ball above your head. As you do so, extend through the hips, knees, and ankles to load up for the slam.
At peak extension, flex the shoulders, spine, and hips to throw the ball hard into the ground directly in front of you.
Catch the ball on the bounce and continue for the desired number of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Start in a De Pie position with a staggered, athletic stance. Hold a medicine ball in one hand, on the same Lateral as your Espalda Pierna. This will be your starting position. Begin by winding the arm, raising the medicine ball above your head. As you do so, extend through the Caderas, knees, and ankles to load up for the slam. At peak Extensión, flex the Hombros, spine, and Caderas to thRemo the ball hard into the ground directly in Frontal of you. Catch the ball on the bounce and continue for the desired number of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Otis-up
Abdominales.instructions:
Asegura tus pies y recuéstate en el suelo. Las rodillas deben estar dobladas. Sostenga un peso con ambas manos contra el pecho. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Inicie el movimiento flexionando las caderas y la columna vertebral para levantar el torso del suelo.
A medida que se mueve hacia arriba, presione el peso hacia arriba para que quede por encima de su cabeza en la parte superior del movimiento.
Vuelva a colocar el peso en el pecho mientras invierte el movimiento de abdominales, asegurándose de no llegar hasta el suelo.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Secure your feet and lay back on the floor. Your knees should be bent. Hold a weight with both hands to your chest. This will be your starting position.
Initiate the movement by flexing the hips and spine to raise your torso up from the ground.
As you move up, press the weight up so that it is above your head at the top of the movement.
Return the weight to your chest as you reverse the sit-up motion, ensuring not to go all the way down to the floor.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Secure your feet and lay Espalda on the Suelo. Your knees should be bent. Hold a weight with both hands to your Pecho. This will be your starting position. Initiate the movement by flexing the Caderas and spine to Elevación your torso up from the ground. As you move up, Press the weight up so that it is above your head at the top of the movement. Return the weight to your Pecho as you Inverso the Abdominales motion, ensuring not to go all the way down to the Suelo.

Abdominales.name: Estiramiento por Encima de la Cabeza
Abdominales.instructions:
De pie, junte los dedos y abra las palmas hacia el techo. Mantén los hombros hacia abajo mientras extiendes los brazos hacia arriba.
Para crear un estiramiento completo del torso, tira del coxis hacia abajo y estabiliza el torso mientras lo haces. Estira los músculos de la parte delantera y trasera del torso.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Standing straight up, lace your fingers together and open your palms to the ceiling. Keep your shoulders down as you extend your arms up.
To create a full torso stretch, pull your tailbone down and stabilize your torso as you do this. Stretch the muscles on both the front and the back of the torso.
Abdominales.instructions_es: De Pie straight up, lace your fingers together and open your palms to the ceiling. Keep your Hombros down as you extend your arms up. To create a full torso stretch, pull your tailbone down and stabilize your torso as you do this. Stretch the Muslos on both the Frontal and the Espalda of the torso.

Abdominales.name: Pallof Press
Abdominales.instructions:
Connect a standard handle to a tower, and—if possible—position the cable to shoulder height. If not, a low pulley will suffice.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with both hands and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart and knees slightly bent, hold the cable to the middle of your chest. This will be your starting position.
Press the cable away from your chest, fully extending both arms. You core should be tight and engaged.
Hold the repetition for several seconds before returning to the starting position.
At the conclusion of the set, repeat facing the other direction.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Connect a standard handle to a tower, and—if possible—position the cable to shoulder height. If not, a low pulley will suffice.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with both hands and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart and knees slightly bent, hold the cable to the middle of your chest. This will be your starting position.
Press the cable away from your chest, fully extending both arms. You core should be tight and engaged.
Hold the repetition for several seconds before returning to the starting position.
At the conclusion of the set, repeat facing the other direction.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Connect a Estándar handle to a tower, and—if possible—position the Polea to Hombro height. If not, a Bajo pulley will suffice. With your Lateral to the Polea, grab the handle with both hands and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the Polea. With your feet positioned Cadera-width apart and knees slightly bent, hold the Polea to the middle of your Pecho. This will be your starting position. Press the Polea away from your Pecho, fully extending both arms. You core should be tight and engaged. Hold the repetition for several seconds before returning to the starting position. At the conclusion of the set, repeat facing the other direction.

Abdominales.name: Prensa Pallof con Rotación
Abdominales.instructions:
Connect a standard handle to a tower, and position the cable to shoulder height.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the cable. Align outstretched arm with cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart, pull the cable into your chest and grab the handle with your other hand. Both hands should be on the handle at this time.
Facing forward, press the cable away from your chest. You core should be tight and engaged.
Keeping your hips straight, twist your torso away from the pulley until you get a full quarter rotation.
Maintain your rigid stance and straight arms. Return to the neutral position in a slow and controlled manner. Your arms should be extended in front of you.
With the side tension still engaging your core, bring your hands to your chest and immediately press outward to a fully extended position. This constitutes one rep.
Repeat to failure.
Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Connect a standard handle to a tower, and position the cable to shoulder height.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the cable. Align outstretched arm with cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart, pull the cable into your chest and grab the handle with your other hand. Both hands should be on the handle at this time.
Facing forward, press the cable away from your chest. You core should be tight and engaged.
Keeping your hips straight, twist your torso away from the pulley until you get a full quarter rotation.
Maintain your rigid stance and straight arms. Return to the neutral position in a slow and controlled manner. Your arms should be extended in front of you.
With the side tension still engaging your core, bring your hands to your chest and immediately press outward to a fully extended position. This constitutes one rep.
Repeat to failure.
Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Connect a Estándar handle to a tower, and position the Polea to Hombro height. With your Lateral to the Polea, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the Polea. Align outstretched arm with Polea. With your feet positioned Cadera-width apart, pull the Polea into your Pecho and grab the handle with your other hand. Both hands should be on the handle at this time. Facing forward, Press the Polea away from your Pecho. You core should be tight and engaged. Keeping your Caderas straight, twist your torso away from the pulley until you get a full quarter rotation. Maintain your rigid stance and straight arms. Return to the neutral position in a sBajo and controlled manner. Your arms should be extended in Frontal of you. With the Lateral tension still engaging your core, bring your hands to your Pecho and immediately Press outward to a fully extended position. This constitutes one rep. Repeat to failure. Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite Lateral.

Abdominales.name: Plancha
Abdominales.instructions:
Ponte en posición prona en el suelo, apoyando tu peso sobre los dedos de los pies y los antebrazos. Tus brazos están doblados y directamente debajo del hombro.
Mantenga su cuerpo recto en todo momento y mantenga esta posición el mayor tiempo posible. Para aumentar la dificultad, se puede levantar un brazo o una pierna.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Get into a prone position on the floor, supporting your weight on your toes and your forearms. Your arms are bent and directly below the shoulder.
Keep your body straight at all times, and hold this position as long as possible. To increase difficulty, an arm or leg can be raised.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Get into a Tumbado Prono position on the Suelo, supporting your weight on your toes and your foPosteriorms. Your arms are bent and directly beBajo the Hombro. Keep your body straight at all times, and hold this position as long as possible. To increase difficulty, an arm or Pierna can be Elevaciónd.

Abdominales.name: Disco Twist
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie down on the floor or an exercise mat with your legs fully extended and your upper body upright. Grab the plate by its sides with both hands out in front of your abdominals with your arms slightly bent.
Slowly cross your legs near your ankles and lift them up off the ground. Your knees should also be bent slightly. Note: Move your upper body back slightly to help keep you balanced turning this exercise. This is the starting position.
Move the plate to the left side and touch the floor with it. Breathe out as you perform that movement.
Come back to the starting position as you breathe in and then repeat the movement but this time to the right side of the body. Tip: Use a slow controlled movement at all times. Jerking motions can injure the back.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie down on the floor or an exercise mat with your legs fully extended and your upper body upright. Grab the plate by its sides with both hands out in front of your abdominals with your arms slightly bent.
Slowly cross your legs near your ankles and lift them up off the ground. Your knees should also be bent slightly. Note: Move your upper body back slightly to help keep you balanced turning this exercise. This is the starting position.
Move the plate to the left side and touch the floor with it. Breathe out as you perform that movement.
Come back to the starting position as you breathe in and then repeat the movement but this time to the right side of the body. Tip: Use a slow controlled movement at all times. Jerking motions can injure the back.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie down on the Suelo or an exercise mat with your Piernas fully extended and your upper body Vertical. Grab the Disco by its Laterals with both hands out in Frontal of your Abdominals with your arms slightly bent. SBajoly cross your Piernas near your ankles and lift them up off the ground. Your knees should also be bent slightly. Note: Move your upper body Espalda slightly to help keep you balanced turning this exercise. This is the starting position. Move the Disco to the left Lateral and touch the Suelo with it. Breathe out as you perform that movement. Come Espalda to the starting position as you breathe in and then repeat the movement but this time to the right Lateral of the body. Tip: Use a sBajo controlled movement at all times. Envióning motions can injure the Espalda. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Pulse Sit-up
Abdominales.instructions:
To begin, lie down on a bench with a barbell resting on your chest. Position your legs so they are secure on the extension of the abdominal bench. This is the starting position.
While inhaling, tighten your abdominals and glutes. Simultaneously curl your torso as you do when performing a sit-up and press the barbell to an overhead position while exhaling. Tip: Use your arms to push the barbell out as you perform this exercise while still focusing on the abdominal muscles.
Lower your upper body back down to the starting position while bringing the barbell back down to your torso. Remember to breathe in while lowering the body.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
To begin, lie down on a bench with a barbell resting on your chest. Position your legs so they are secure on the extension of the abdominal bench. This is the starting position.
While inhaling, tighten your abdominals and glutes. Simultaneously curl your torso as you do when performing a sit-up and press the barbell to an overhead position while exhaling. Tip: Use your arms to push the barbell out as you perform this exercise while still focusing on the abdominal muscles.
Lower your upper body back down to the starting position while bringing the barbell back down to your torso. Remember to breathe in while lowering the body.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: To begin, lie down on a bench with a Barra resting on your Pecho. Position your Piernas so they are secure on the Extensión of the Abdominal bench. This is the starting position. While inhaling, tighten your Abdominals and Glúteos. Simultaneously Curl your torso as you do when performing a Abdominales and Press the Barra to an Sobre la Cabeza position while exhaling. Tip: Use your arms to push the Barra out as you perform this exercise while still focusing on the Abdominal Muslos. Bajoer your upper body Espalda down to the starting position while bringing the Barra Espalda down to your torso. Remember to breathe in while Bajoering the body. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Inverso Crunch
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie down on the floor with your legs fully extended and arms to the side of your torso with the palms on the floor. Your arms should be stationary for the entire exercise.
Move your legs up so that your thighs are perpendicular to the floor and feet are together and parallel to the floor. This is the starting position.
While inhaling, move your legs towards the torso as you roll your pelvis backwards and you raise your hips off the floor. At the end of this movement your knees will be touching your chest.
Hold the contraction for a second and move your legs back to the starting position while exhaling.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie down on the floor with your legs fully extended and arms to the side of your torso with the palms on the floor. Your arms should be stationary for the entire exercise.
Move your legs up so that your thighs are perpendicular to the floor and feet are together and parallel to the floor. This is the starting position.
While inhaling, move your legs towards the torso as you roll your pelvis backwards and you raise your hips off the floor. At the end of this movement your knees will be touching your chest.
Hold the contraction for a second and move your legs back to the starting position while exhaling.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie down on the Suelo with your Piernas fully extended and arms to the Lateral of your torso with the palms on the Suelo. Your arms should be stationary for the entire exercise. Move your Piernas up so that your tAltos are perpendicular to the Suelo and feet are together and parallel to the Suelo. This is the starting position. While inhaling, move your Piernas towards the torso as you roll your pelvis Espaldawards and you Elevación your Caderas off the Suelo. At the end of this movement your knees will be touching your Pecho. Hold the contraction for a second and move your Piernas Espalda to the starting position while exhaling. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Crujido de Cuerda
Abdominales.instructions:
Arrodíllate 1-2 pies frente a un sistema de cables con una cuerda atada.
Después de seleccionar un peso adecuado, sujete la cuerda con ambas manos por encima de la cabeza. El torso debe estar erguido en la posición inicial.
Para comenzar, flexione la columna vertebral, tratando de llevar la caja torácica a las piernas mientras tira del cable hacia abajo.
Haz una pausa en la parte inferior del movimiento y luego vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Estos se pueden hacer con giros o hacia un lado para golpear los oblicuos.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Kneel 1-2 feet in front of a cable system with a rope attached.
After selecting an appropriate weight, grasp the rope with both hands reaching overhead. Your torso should be upright in the starting position.
To begin, flex at the spine, attempting to bring your rib cage to your legs as you pull the cable down.
Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then slowly return to the starting position.
These can be done with twists or to the side to hit the obliques.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Kneel 1-2 feet in Frontal of a Polea system with a rope attached. After selecting an appropriate weight, grasp the rope with both hands reaching Sobre la Cabeza. Your torso should be Vertical in the starting position. To begin, flex at the spine, attempting to bring your rib cage to your Piernas as you pull the Polea down. Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then sBajoly return to the starting position. These can be done with twists or to the Lateral to hit the obliques.

Abdominales.name: Giro Ruso
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie down on the floor placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your legs should be bent at the knees.
Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Your arms should be fully extended in front of you perpendicular to your torso and with the hands clasped. This is the starting position.
Twist your torso to the right side until your arms are parallel with the floor while breathing out.
Hold the contraction for a second and move back to the starting position while breathing out. Now move to the opposite side performing the same techniques you applied to the right side.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie down on the floor placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your legs should be bent at the knees.
Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Your arms should be fully extended in front of you perpendicular to your torso and with the hands clasped. This is the starting position.
Twist your torso to the right side until your arms are parallel with the floor while breathing out.
Hold the contraction for a second and move back to the starting position while breathing out. Now move to the opposite side performing the same techniques you applied to the right side.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie down on the Suelo placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your Piernas should be bent at the knees. Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your tAltos. Your arms should be fully extended in Frontal of you perpendicular to your torso and with the hands clasped. This is the starting position. Twist your torso to the right Lateral until your arms are parallel with the Suelo while breathing out. Hold the contraction for a second and move Espalda to the starting position while breathing out. Now move to the opposite Lateral performing the same techniques you applied to the right Lateral. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Patada de Tijera
Abdominales.instructions:
To begin, lie down with your back pressed against the floor or on an exercise mat (optional). Your arms should be fully extended to the sides with your palms facing down. Note: The arms should be stationary the entire time.
With a slight bend at the knees, lift your legs up so that your heels are about 6 inches off the ground. This is the starting position.
Now lift your left leg up to about a 45 degree angle while your right leg is lowered until the heel is about 2-3 inches from the ground.
Switch movements by raising your right leg up and lowering your left leg. Remember to breathe while performing this exercise.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
To begin, lie down with your back pressed against the floor or on an exercise mat (optional). Your arms should be fully extended to the sides with your palms facing down. Note: The arms should be stationary the entire time.
With a slight bend at the knees, lift your legs up so that your heels are about 6 inches off the ground. This is the starting position.
Now lift your left leg up to about a 45 degree angle while your right leg is lowered until the heel is about 2-3 inches from the ground.
Switch movements by raising your right leg up and lowering your left leg. Remember to breathe while performing this exercise.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: To begin, lie down with your Espalda Pressed against the Suelo or on an exercise mat (optional). Your arms should be fully extended to the Laterals with your palms facing down. Note: The arms should be stationary the entire time. With a slight bend at the knees, lift your Piernas up so that your heels are about 6 inches off the ground. This is the starting position. Now lift your left Pierna up to about a 45 degree angle while your right Pierna is Bajoered until the heel is about 2-3 inches from the ground. Switch movements by raising your right Pierna up and Bajoering your left Pierna. Remember to breathe while performing this exercise. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Sentado Barra Twist
Abdominales.instructions:
Start out by sitting at the end of a flat bench with a barbell placed on top of your thighs. Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other.
Grip the bar with your palms facing down and make sure your hands are wider than shoulder width apart from each other. Begin to lift the barbell up over your head until your arms are fully extended.
Now lower the barbell behind your head until it is resting along the base of your neck. This is the starting position.
While keeping your feet and head stationary, move your waist from side to side so that your oblique muscles feel the contraction. Only move from side to side as far as your waist will allow you to go. Stretching or moving too far can cause an injury to occur. Tip: Use a slow and controlled motion.
Remember to breathe out while twisting your body to the side and in when moving back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Start out by sitting at the end of a flat bench with a barbell placed on top of your thighs. Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other.
Grip the bar with your palms facing down and make sure your hands are wider than shoulder width apart from each other. Begin to lift the barbell up over your head until your arms are fully extended.
Now lower the barbell behind your head until it is resting along the base of your neck. This is the starting position.
While keeping your feet and head stationary, move your waist from side to side so that your oblique muscles feel the contraction. Only move from side to side as far as your waist will allow you to go. Stretching or moving too far can cause an injury to occur. Tip: Use a slow and controlled motion.
Remember to breathe out while twisting your body to the side and in when moving back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Start out by sitting at the end of a flat bench with a Barra placed on top of your tAltos. Your feet should be Hombro width apart from each other. Grip the bar with your palms facing down and make sure your hands are wider than Hombro width apart from each other. Begin to lift the Barra up over your head until your arms are fully extended. Now Bajoer the Barra behind your head until it is resting along the base of your neck. This is the starting position. While keeping your feet and head stationary, move your waist from Lateral to Lateral so that your oblique Muslos feel the contraction. Only move from Lateral to Lateral as far as your waist will alBajo you to go. Stretching or moving too far can cause an injury to occur. Tip: Use a sBajo and controlled motion. Remember to breathe out while twisting your body to the Lateral and in when moving Espalda to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Sentado Flat Bench Pierna Pull-in
Abdominales.instructions:
Siéntate en un banco con las piernas estiradas frente a ti ligeramente por debajo del paralelo y los brazos a los lados del banco. El torso debe estar inclinado hacia atrás en un ángulo de 45 grados desde el banco. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Lleva las rodillas hacia ti mientras acercas el torso a ellas al mismo tiempo. Exhala mientras realizas este movimiento.
Después de una segunda pausa, vuelva a la posición inicial mientras inhala.
Repita la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Sit on a bench with the legs stretched out in front of you slightly below parallel and your arms holding on to the sides of the bench. Your torso should be leaning backwards around a 45-degree angle from the bench. This will be your starting position.
Bring the knees in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Breathe out as you perform this movement.
After a second pause, go back to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Sit on a bench with the Piernas stretched out in Frontal of you slightly beBajo parallel and your arms holding on to the Laterals of the bench. Your torso should be leaning Espaldawards around a 45-degree angle from the bench. This will be your starting position. Bring the knees in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Breathe out as you perform this movement. After a second pause, go Espalda to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Dragon Flag Tuck
Abdominales.instructions:
Siéntate en un banco con las piernas estiradas frente a ti ligeramente por debajo del paralelo y los brazos a los lados del banco. El torso debe estar inclinado hacia atrás en un ángulo de 45 grados desde el banco. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Lleva las rodillas hacia ti mientras acercas el torso a ellas al mismo tiempo. Exhala mientras realizas este movimiento.
Después de una segunda pausa, vuelva a la posición inicial mientras inhala.
Repita la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Sit on a bench with the legs stretched out in front of you slightly below parallel and your arms holding on to the sides of the bench. Your torso should be leaning backwards around a 45-degree angle from the bench. This will be your starting position.
Bring the knees in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Breathe out as you perform this movement.
After a second pause, go back to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Sit on a bench with the Piernas stretched out in Frontal of you slightly beBajo parallel and your arms holding on to the Laterals of the bench. Your torso should be leaning Espaldawards around a 45-degree angle from the bench. This will be your starting position. Bring the knees in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Breathe out as you perform this movement. After a second pause, go Espalda to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Estiramiento por Encima de la Cabeza Sentado
Abdominales.instructions:
Siéntese derecho sobre una colchoneta de ejercicios.
Toque las plantas de los pies junto con los pies de seis a ocho pulgadas delante de las caderas.
Coloque una mano en el suelo a su lado y la otra detrás de la cabeza.
Levanta el codo hacia el techo mientras inclinas el torso hacia el otro lado. Mantenga durante 10 a 20 segundos, luego cambie de lado.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Sit up straight on an exercise mat.
Touch the soles of your feet together with your feet six to eight inches in front of your hips.
Place one hand on the floor beside you and your other hand behind your head.
Lift your elbow to the ceiling as you incline your torso to the other side. Hold for 10 to 20 seconds, then switch sides.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Sit up straight on an exercise mat. Touch the soles of your feet together with your feet six to eight inches in Frontal of your Caderas. Place one hand on the Suelo beLateral you and your other hand behind your head. Lift your elbow to the ceiling as you Inclinado your torso to the other Lateral. Hold for 10 to 20 seconds, then switch Laterals.

Abdominales.name: Abdominales
Abdominales.instructions:
Lie down on the floor placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your legs should be bent at the knees.
Place your hands behind your head and lock them together by clasping your fingers. This is the starting position.
Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Breathe out when performing this part of the exercise.
Once you feel the contraction for a second, lower your upper body back down to the starting position while inhaling.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Lie down on the floor placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your legs should be bent at the knees.
Place your hands behind your head and lock them together by clasping your fingers. This is the starting position.
Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Breathe out when performing this part of the exercise.
Once you feel the contraction for a second, lower your upper body back down to the starting position while inhaling.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Lie down on the Suelo placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner hold them. Your Piernas should be bent at the knees. Place your hands behind your head and lock them together by clasping your fingers. This is the starting position. Elevate your upper body so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your tAltos. Breathe out when performing this part of the exercise. Once you feel the contraction for a second, Bajoer your upper body Espalda down to the starting position while inhaling. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Trineogemartillo Swings
Abdominales.instructions:
You will need a tire and a sledgehammer for this exercise. Stand in front of the tire about two feet away from it with a staggered stance. Grip the sledgehammer.
If you are right handed, your left hand should be at the bottom of the handle, and your right hand should be choking up closer to the head.
As you bring the sledge up, your right hand slides toward the head; as you swing down, your right hand will slide down to join your left hand. Slam it down as hard as you can against the tire. Control the bounce of the hammer off of the tire.
Repeat on the other side.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
You will need a tire and a sledgehammer for this exercise. Stand in front of the tire about two feet away from it with a staggered stance. Grip the sledgehammer.
If you are right handed, your left hand should be at the bottom of the handle, and your right hand should be choking up closer to the head.
As you bring the sledge up, your right hand slides toward the head; as you swing down, your right hand will slide down to join your left hand. Slam it down as hard as you can against the tire. Control the bounce of the hammer off of the tire.
Repeat on the other side.
Abdominales.instructions_es: You will need a tire and a TrineogeMartillo for this exercise. Stand in Frontal of the tire about two feet away from it with a staggered stance. Grip the TrineogeMartillo. If you are right handed, your left hand should be at the bottom of the handle, and your right hand should be choking up closer to the head. As you bring the Trineoge up, your right hand slides toward the head; as you swing down, your right hand will slide down to join your left hand. Slam it down as hard as you can against the tire. Control the bounce of the Martillo off of the tire. Repeat on the other Lateral.

Abdominales.name: Multipower Máquina Cadera Elevación
Abdominales.instructions:
Position a bench in the rack and load the bar to an appropriate weight. Lie down on the bench, placing the bottom of your feet against the bar. Unlock the bar and extend your legs. You may need to use your hands to assist you. For added stability grasp the sides of the Smith Machine. This will be your starting position.
Initiate the movement by rotating your pelvis, flexing your spine to raise your hips off of the bench. Maintain a slight bend in the knees throughout the motion.
After a brief pause, return the hips to the bench.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Position a bench in the rack and load the bar to an appropriate weight. Lie down on the bench, placing the bottom of your feet against the bar. Unlock the bar and extend your legs. You may need to use your hands to assist you. For added stability grasp the sides of the Smith Machine. This will be your starting position.
Initiate the movement by rotating your pelvis, flexing your spine to raise your hips off of the bench. Maintain a slight bend in the knees throughout the motion.
After a brief pause, return the hips to the bench.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Position a bench in the rack and load the bar to an appropriate weight. Lie down on the bench, placing the bottom of your feet against the bar. Unlock the bar and extend your Piernas. You may need to use your hands to assist you. For added stability grasp the Laterals of the MultiPower. This will be your starting position. Initiate the movement by rotating your pelvis, flexing your spine to Elevación your Caderas off of the bench. Maintain a slight bend in the knees throughout the motion. After a brief pause, return the Caderas to the bench. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

Abdominales.name: Lanzador de Hechizos
Abdominales.instructions:
Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre pronado. Los pies deben estar anchos con las caderas y las rodillas extendidas. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Comienza el movimiento tirando de las dos mancuernas hacia un lado junto a la cadera, girando el torso.
Manteniendo los brazos rectos y las mancuernas paralelas al suelo, gire el torso para balancear las pesas hacia el lado opuesto.
Continúe alternando, girando de un lado a otro hasta que el conjunto esté completo.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Hold a dumbbell in each hand with a pronated grip. Your feet should be wide with your hips and knees extended. This will be your starting position.
Begin the movement by pulling both of the dumbbells to one side next to your hip, rotating your torso.
Keeping your arms straight and the dumbbells parallel to the ground, rotate your torso to swing the weights to your opposite side.
Continue alternating, rotating from one side to the other until the set is complete.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Hold a Mancuerna in each hand with a pronated grip. Your feet should be wide with your Caderas and knees extended. This will be your starting position. Begin the movement by pulling both of the Mancuernas to one Lateral next to your Cadera, rotating your torso. Keeping your arms straight and the Mancuernas parallel to the ground, rotate your torso to swing the weights to your opposite Lateral. Continue Alternando, rotating from one Lateral to the other until the set is complete.

Abdominales.name: Araña Crawl
Abdominales.instructions:
Comience en posición prona en el suelo. Apoye su peso sobre las manos y los dedos de los pies, con los pies juntos y el cuerpo recto. Los brazos deben estar doblados a 90 grados. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Inicie el movimiento levantando un pie del suelo. Gire externamente la pierna y lleve la rodilla hacia el codo, lo más hacia adelante posible.
Vuelva a colocar esta pierna en la posición inicial y repita en el lado opuesto.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
Begin in a prone position on the floor. Support your weight on your hands and toes, with your feet together and your body straight. Your arms should be bent to 90 degrees. This will be your starting position.
Initiate the movement by raising one foot off of the ground. Externally rotate the leg and bring the knee toward your elbow, as far forward as possible.
Return this leg to the starting position and repeat on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_es: Begin in a Tumbado Prono position on the Suelo. Support your weight on your hands and toes, with your feet together and your body straight. Your arms should be bent to 90 degrees. This will be your starting position. Initiate the movement by raising one foot off of the ground. Externally rotate the Pierna and bring the knee toward your elbow, as far forward as possible. Return this Pierna to the starting position and repeat on the opposite Lateral.

Abdominales.name: De Pie Polea Lift
Abdominales.instructions:
Connect a standard handle on a tower, and move the cable to the lowest pulley position.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the weight on the cable. Your outstretched arm should be aligned with the cable.
With your feet positioned shoulder width apart, squat down and grab the handle with both hands. Your arms should still be fully extended.
In one motion, pull the handle up and across your body until your arms are in a fully-extended position above your head.
Keep your back straight and your arms close to your body as you pivot your back foot and straighten your legs to get a full range of motion.
Retract your arms and then your body. Return to the neutral position in a slow and controlled manner.
Repeat to failure.
Then, reposition and repeat the same series of movements on the opposite side.
Abdominales.instructions_en:
