Bíceps.instructions_es: Hold a Mancuerna in each hand and lie Espalda on an Banca Inclinada. The Mancuernas should be at arm's length Colgadoing at your Laterals and your palms should be facing out. This will be your starting position. Now as you exhale Curl the weight outward and up while keeping your foPosteriorms in line with your Lateral deltoids. Continue the Curl until the Mancuernas are at Hombro height and to the Laterals of your deltoids. Tip: The end of the movement should look similar to a double Bíceps pose. After a second contraction at the top of the movement, start to inhale and sBajoly Bajoer the weights Espalda to the starting position using the same path used to bring them up. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Rizo de Cable Tendido
Bíceps.instructions:
Grab a straight bar or E-Z bar attachment that is attached to the low pulley with both hands, using an underhand (palms facing up) shoulder-width grip.
Lie flat on your back on top of an exercise mat in front of the weight stack with your feet flat against the frame of the pulley machine and your legs straight.
With your arms extended and your elbows close to your body slightly bend your arms. This will be your starting position.
While keeping your upper arms stationary and the elbows close to your body, curl the bar up slowly toward your chest as you breathe out and you squeeze the biceps.
After a second squeeze at the top of the movement, slowly return to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.instructions_es: Grab a straight bar or E-Z bar attachment that is attached to the Bajo pulley with both hands, using an underhand (palms facing up) Hombro-width grip. Lie flat on your Espalda on top of an exercise mat in Frontal of the weight stack with your feet flat against the frame of the pulley Máquina and your Piernas straight. With your arms extended and your elbows close to your body slightly bend your arms. This will be your starting position. While keeping your upper arms stationary and the elbows close to your body, Curl the bar up sBajoly toward your Pecho as you breathe out and you squeeze the Bíceps. After a second squeeze at the top of the movement, sBajoly return to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Barra de Agarre Cerrado Acostado en la Polea Alta
Bíceps.instructions:
Place a flat bench in front of a high pulley or lat pulldown machine.
Hold the straight bar attachment using an underhand grip (palms up) that is about shoulder width.
Lie on your back with your head over the end of the bench.
Now extend your arms straight above your shoulders. Your torso and your arms should make a 90-degree angle and the elbows should be in. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe out, curl the bar down in a semicircular motion until it touches your chin. Squeeze the biceps for a second at the top contracted position. Tip: As you execute this motion only the forearms should move. At no time should the upper arms be moving at all. They are to remain perpendicular throughout the movement.
Return to starting position slowly.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.name_en: Lying Close-Grip Bar Curl On High Pulley

Hold the straight bar attachment using an underhand grip (palms up) that is about shoulder width.

Now extend your arms straight above your shoulders. Your torso and your arms should make a 90-degree angle and the elbows should be in. This will be your starting position.

Tip: As you execute this motion only the forearms should move. At no time should the upper arms be moving at all. They are to remain perpendicular throughout the movement.
Return to starting position slowly.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Place a flat bench in Frontal of a Alto pulley or Jalón al Pecho Máquina. Hold the straight bar attachment using an underhand grip (palms up) that is about Hombro width. Lie on your Espalda with your head over the end of the bench. Now extend your arms straight above your Hombros. Your torso and your arms should make a 90-degree angle and the elbows should be in. This will be your starting position. As you breathe out, Curl the bar down in a semicircular motion until it touches your chin. Squeeze the Bíceps for a second at the top contracted position. Tip: As you execute this motion only the foPosteriorms should move. At no time should the upper arms be moving at all. They are to remain perpendicular throughout the movement. Return to starting position sBajoly. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Rizo de Barra de Banco Alto Acostado
Bíceps.instructions:
Lie face forward on a tall flat bench while holding a barbell with a supinated grip (palms facing up). Tip: If you are holding a barbell grab it using a shoulder-width grip and if you are using an E-Z Bar grab it on the inner handles. Your upper body should be positioned in a way that the upper chest is over the end of the bench and the barbell is hanging in front of you with the arms extended and perpendicular to the floor. This will be your starting position.
While keeping the elbows in and the upper arms stationary, curl the weight up in a semi-circular motion as you contract the biceps and exhale. Hold at the top of the movement for a second.
As you inhale, slowly go back to the starting position. Tip: Maintain full control of the weight at all times and avoid any swinging. Remember, only the forearms should move throughout the movement.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Your upper body should be positioned in a way that the upper Pecho is over the end of the bench and the Barra is Colgadoing in Frontal of you with the arms extended and perpendicular to the Suelo. Hold at the top of the movement for a second. As you inhale, sBajoly go Espalda to the starting position. Tip: Maintain full control of the weight at all times and avoid any swinging. Remember, only the foPosteriorms should move throughout the movement. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Mancuernas Tumbado en Posición Supina
Bíceps.instructions:
Lie down on a flat bench face up while holding a dumbbell in each arm on top of your thighs.
Bring the dumbbells to the sides with the arms extended and the palms of the hands facing your thighs (neutral grip).
While keeping the arms close to your torso and elbows in, slowly lower your arms (as you keep them extended with a slight bend at the elbows) as far down towards the floor as you can go. Once you cannot go down any further, lock your upper arms in that position and that will be your starting position.
As you breathe out, slowly begin to curl the weights up as you simultaneously rotate your wrists so that the palms of the hands face up. Continue curling the weight until your biceps are fully contracted and squeeze hard at the top position for a second. Tip: Only the forearms should move. Upper arms should remain stationary and elbows should stay in throughout the movement.
Return back to the starting position very slowly.
Bíceps.instructions_en:

Bring the dumbbells to the sides with the arms extended and the palms of the hands facing your thighs (neutral grip).
While keeping the arms close to your torso and elbows in, slowly lower your arms (as you keep them extended with a slight bend at the elbows) as far down towards the floor as you can go. Bring the Mancuernas to the Laterals with the arms extended and the palms of the hands facing your tAltos (Agarre Neutro). While keeping the arms close to your torso and elbows in, sBajoly Bajoer your arms (as you keep them extended with a slight bend at the elbows) as far down towards the Suelo as you can go. As you breathe out, sBajoly begin to Curl the weights up as you simultaneously rotate your Muñecas so that the palms of the hands face up. Continue Curling the weight until your Bíceps are fully contracted and squeeze hard at the top position for a second. Tip: Only the foPosteriorms should move. Upper arms should remain stationary and elbows should stay in throughout the movement. Return Espalda to the starting position very sBajoly.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Bíceps de la Máquina
Bíceps.instructions:
Ajuste el asiento a la altura adecuada y haga su selección de peso. Coloque la parte superior de los brazos contra las almohadillas y agarre las asas. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Realice el movimiento flexionando el codo, tirando de la parte inferior del brazo hacia la parte superior del brazo.
Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento y luego regrese lentamente el peso a la posición inicial.
Evite devolver el peso hasta los topes hasta que el conjunto esté completo para mantener la tensión en los músculos que se están trabajando.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Adjust the seat to the appropriate height and make your weight selection. Place your upper arms against the pads and grasp the handles. This will be your starting position.
Perform the movement by flexing the elbow, pulling your lower arm towards your upper arm.
Pause at the top of the movement, and then slowly return the weight to the starting position.
Avoid returning the weight all the way to the stops until the set is complete to keep tension on the muscles being worked.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Adjust the seat to the appropriate height and make your weight selection. Place your upper arms against the pads and grasp the handles. This will be your starting position. Perform the movement by flexing the elbow, pulling your Bajoer arm towards your upper arm. Pause at the top of the movement, and then sBajoly return the weight to the starting position. Bíceps.name: Machine Preacher Curls
Bíceps.instructions:
Sit down on the Preacher Curl Machine and select the weight.
Place the back of your upper arms (your triceps) on the preacher pad provided and grab the handles using an underhand grip (palms facing up). Tip: Make sure that when you place the arms on the pad you keep the elbows in. This will be your starting position.
Now lift the handles as you exhale and you contract the biceps. At the top of the position make sure that you hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Only the forearms should move. The upper arms should remain stationary and on the pad at all times.
Lower the handles slowly back to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Sit down on the Preacher Curl Machine and select the weight.
Place the back of your upper arms (your triceps) on the preacher pad provided and grab the handles using an underhand grip (palms facing up). Tip: Make sure that when you place the arms on the pad you keep the elbows in. This will be your starting position.
Now lift the handles as you exhale and you contract the biceps. At the top of the position make sure that you hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Only the forearms should move. The upper arms should remain stationary and on the pad at all times.
Lower the handles slowly back to the starting position as you inhale.

Bíceps.instructions_es: Sit down on the Curl Predicador Máquina and select the weight. Place the Espalda of your upper arms (your Tríceps) on the Predicador pad provided and grab the handles using an underhand grip (palms facing up). Tip: Make sure that when you place the arms on the pad you keep the elbows in. This will be your starting position. Now lift the handles as you exhale and you contract the Bíceps. At the top of the position make sure that you hold the contraction for a second. Tip: Only the foPosteriorms should move. The upper arms should remain stationary and on the pad at all times. Bajoer the handles sBajoly Espalda to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Predicador con Mancuernas en Un Brazo
Bíceps.instructions:
Grab a dumbbell with the right arm and place the upper arm on top of the preacher bench or the incline bench. The dumbbell should be held at shoulder length. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbell until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weight up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger higher than the thumb.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Switch arms and repeat the movement.

This will be your starting position. As you breathe in, sBajoly Bajoer the Mancuerna until your upper arm is extended and the Bíceps is fully stretched. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger Altoer than the thumb. Bíceps.name: Curl del Cable Aéreo
Bíceps.instructions:
To begin, set a weight that is comfortable on each side of the pulley machine. Note: Make sure that the amount of weight selected is the same on each side.
Now adjust the height of the pulleys on each side and make sure that they are positioned at a height higher than that of your shoulders.
Stand in the middle of both sides and use an underhand grip (palms facing towards the ceiling) to grab each handle. Your arms should be fully extended and parallel to the floor with your feet positioned shoulder width apart from each other. Your body should be evenly aligned the handles. This is the starting position.
While exhaling, slowly squeeze the biceps on each side until your forearms and biceps touch.
While inhaling, move your forearms back to the starting position. Note: Your entire body is stationary during this exercise except for the forearms.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

This is the starting position. While exhaling, sBajoly squeeze the Bíceps on each Lateral until your foPosteriorms and Bíceps touch. While inhaling, move your foPosteriorms Espalda to the starting position. Note: Your entire body is stationary during this exercise except for the foPosteriorms. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Predicador
Bíceps.instructions:
To perform this movement you will need a preacher bench and an E-Z bar. Grab the E-Z curl bar at the close inner handle (either have someone hand you the bar which is preferable or grab the bar from the front bar rest provided by most preacher benches). The palm of your hands should be facing forward and they should be slightly tilted inwards due to the shape of the bar.
With the upper arms positioned against the preacher bench pad and the chest against it, hold the E-Z Curl Bar at shoulder length. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the bar until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weight up until your biceps is fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder height. Squeeze the biceps hard and hold this position for a second.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Martillo de Predicador con Mancuernas
Bíceps.instructions:
Place the upper part of both arms on top of the preacher bench as you hold a dumbbell in each hand with the palms facing each other (neutral grip).
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weight up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Place the upper part of both arms on top of the preacher bench as you hold a dumbbell in each hand with the palms facing each other (neutral grip).
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weight up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Place the upper part of both arms on top of the Predicador bench as you hold a Mancuerna in each hand with the palms facing each other (Agarre Neutro). As you breathe in, sBajoly Bajoer the Mancuernas until your upper arm is extended and the Bíceps is fully stretched. As you exhale, use the Bíceps to Curl the weight up until your Bíceps is fully contracted and the Mancuernas are at Hombro height. Squeeze the Bíceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Barra Inversa
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with your torso upright while holding a barbell at shoulder width with the elbows close to the torso. The palm of your hands should be facing down (pronated grip). This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Slowly begin to bring the bar back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

SBajoly begin to bring the bar Espalda to starting position as your breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curls de Predicador con Barra Invertida
Bíceps.instructions:
Grab an EZ-bar using a shoulder width and palms down (pronated) grip.
Now place the upper part of both arms on top of the preacher bench and have your arms extended. This will be your starting position.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weight up until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder height. Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the barbell until your upper arms are extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curvado de Cable Inverso
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with your torso upright while holding a bar attachment that is attached to a low pulley using a pronated (palms down) and shoulder width grip. Make sure also that you keep the elbows close to the torso. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Slowly begin to bring the bar back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

SBajoly begin to bring the bar Espalda to starting position as your breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curls de Placa Invertidos
Bíceps.instructions:
Start by standing straight with a weighted plate held by both hands and arms fully extended. Use a pronated grip (palms facing down) and make sure your fingers grab the rough side of the plate while your thumb grabs the smooth side. Note: For the best results, grab the weighted plate at an 11:00 and 1:00 o'clock position.
Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other and the weighted plate should be near the groin area. This is the starting position.
Slowly lift the plate up while keeping the elbows in and the upper arms stationary until your biceps and forearms touch while exhaling. The plate should be evenly aligned with your torso at this point.
Feel the contraction for a second and begin to lower the weight back down to the starting position while inhaling
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.instructions_es: Start by De Pie straight with a weighted Disco held by both hands and arms fully extended. Use a pronated grip (palms facing down) and make sure your fingers grab the rough Lateral of the Disco while your thumb grabs the smooth Lateral. Note: For the best results, grab the weighted Disco at an 11:00 and 1:00 o'clock position. Your feet should be Hombro width apart from each other and the weighted Disco should be near the groin area. This is the starting position. SBajoly lift the Disco up while keeping the elbows in and the upper arms stationary until your Bíceps and foPosteriorms touch while exhaling. The Disco should be evenly aligned with your torso at this point. Feel the contraction for a second and begin to Bajoer the weight Espalda down to the starting position while inhaling Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Sentado Bíceps
Bíceps.instructions:
Sit on the floor with your knees bent and your partner standing behind you. Extend your arms straight behind you with your palms facing each other. Your partner will hold your wrists for you. This will be the starting position.
Attempt to flex your elbows, while your partner prevents any actual movement.
After 10-20 seconds, relax your arms while your partner gently pulls your wrists up to stretch your biceps. Be sure to let your partner know when the stretch is appropriate to prevent injury or overstretching.

After 10-20 seconds, relax your arms while your partner gently pulls your wrists up to stretch your biceps. Be sure to let your partner know when the stretch is appropriate to prevent injury or overstretching.

Your partner will hold your Muñecas for you. This will be the starting position. Attempt to flex your elbows, while your partner prevents any actual movement. Bíceps.name: Concentración de Agarre Cerrado Sentado Curl de Barbilla
Bíceps.instructions:
Sit down on a flat bench with a barbell or E-Z Bar in front of you in between your legs. Your legs should be spread with the knees bent and the feet on the floor.
Use your arms to pick the barbell up and place the back of your upper arms on top of your inner thighs (around three and a half inches away from the front of the knee). A supinated grip closer than shoulder width is needed to perform this exercise. Tip: Your arm should be extended at arms length and the barbell should be above the floor. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Slowly begin to bring the barbell back to starting position as your breathe in. Tip: Avoid swinging motions at any time.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Continue the movement until your Bíceps are fully contracted and the Mancuernas are at Hombro level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the Bíceps. Bíceps.name: Curl con Mancuernas Sentado
Bíceps.instructions:
Sit on a flat bench with a dumbbell on each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Rotate the palms of the hands so that they are facing your torso. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arm stationary, curl the weights and start twisting the wrists once the dumbbells pass your thighs so that the palms of your hands face forward at the end of the movement. Make sure that you contract the biceps as you breathe out and make sure that only the forearms move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position as your breathe in and as you rotate the wrists back to a neutral grip.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

SBajoly begin to bring the Mancuernas Espalda to the starting position as your breathe in and as you rotate the Muñecas Espalda to a Agarre Neutro. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Bíceps Interno con Mancuernas Sentado
Bíceps.instructions:
Sit on the end of a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Rotate the palms of the hands so that they are facing inward in a neutral position. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells out and up, turning the palms out as you lift and keeping your forearms in line with your outer deltoids. Tips:
Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position as your breathe in. Remember to rotate your arms as you lower the dumbbells so that you can switch back to a neutral grip.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Remember to rotate your arms as you Bajoer the Mancuernas so that you can switch Espalda to a Agarre Neutro. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl Araña
Bíceps.instructions:
Start out by setting the bar on the part of the preacher bench that you would normally sit on. Make sure to align the barbell properly so that it is balanced and will not fall off.
Move to the front side of the preacher bench (the part where the arms usually lay) and position yourself to lay at a 45 degree slant with your torso and stomach pressed against the front side of the preacher bench.
Make sure that your feet (especially the toes) are well positioned on the floor and place your upper arms on top of the pad located on the inside part of the preacher bench.
Use your arms to grab the barbell with a supinated grip (palms facing up) at about shoulder width apart or slightly closer from each other.
Slowly begin to lift the barbell upwards and exhale. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Slowly begin to bring the barbell back to the starting position as your breathe in. .
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Cable de Bíceps de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with your torso upright while holding a cable curl bar that is attached to a low pulley. Grab the cable bar at shoulder width and keep the elbows close to the torso. The palm of your hands should be facing up (supinated grip). This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Slowly begin to bring the curl bar back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

The palm of your hands should be facing up (supinated grip). This will be your starting position. Continue the movement until your Bíceps are fully contracted and the bar is at Hombro level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the Muslo. SBajoly begin to bring the Curl bar Espalda to starting position as your breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Estiramiento de Bíceps de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
Coloque las manos detrás de la espalda con las palmas juntas, estire los brazos y luego gírelos para que las palmas queden hacia abajo.
Levanta los brazos y aguanta hasta que sientas un estiramiento en los bíceps.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Clasp your hands behind your back with your palms together, straighten arms and then rotate them so your palms face downward.
Raise your arms up and hold until you feel a stretch in your biceps.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Clasp your hands behind your Espalda with your palms together, straighten arms and then rotate them so your palms face downward. Elevación your arms up and hold until you feel a stretch in your Bíceps.

Bíceps.name: Curvatura de Concentración de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
Tomando una mancuerna en su mano de trabajo, inclínese hacia adelante. Permita que su brazo de trabajo cuelgue perpendicular al suelo con el codo apuntando hacia afuera. Esta será tu posición inicial.
Flexione el codo para doblar el peso, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil. En la parte superior de la repetición, flexiona los bíceps y haz una pausa.
Baje la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Repita el movimiento durante la cantidad prescrita de repeticiones.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Taking a dumbbell in your working hand, lean forward. Allow your working arm to hang perpendicular to the ground with the elbow pointing out. This will be your starting position.
Flex the elbow to curl the weight, keeping the upper arm stationary. At the top of the repetition, flex the biceps and pause.
Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Repeat the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Taking a Mancuerna in your working hand, lean forward. AlBajo your working arm to Colgado perpendicular to the ground with the elbow pointing out. This will be your starting position. Flex the elbow to Curl the weight, keeping the upper arm stationary. At the top of the repetition, flex the Bíceps and pause. Bajoer the Mancuerna Espalda to the starting position. Repeat the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl Inverso con Mancuernas de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
To begin, stand straight with a dumbbell in each hand using a pronated grip (palms facing down). Your arms should be fully extended while your feet are shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Bíceps Interno de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with a dumbbell in each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso. Your legs should be at about shoulder's width apart from each other.
Rotate the palms of the hands so that they are facing inward in a neutral position. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights out while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Your wrist should turn so that when the weights are fully elevated you have supinated grip (palms facing up).
Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level. Tip: Keep the forearms aligned with your outer deltoids.
Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position as your breathe in. Remember to rotate the wrists as you lower the weight in order to switch back to a neutral grip.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Bayesian Curl
Bíceps.instructions:
Start out by grabbing single handle next to the low pulley machine. Make sure you are far enough from the machine so that your arm is supporting the weight.
Make sure that your upper arm is stationary, perpendicular to the floor with elbows in and palms facing forward. Your non lifting arm should be grabbing your waist. This will allow you to keep your balance.
Slowly begin to curl the single handle upwards while keeping the upper arm stationary until your forearm touches your bicep while exhaling. Tip: Only the forearm should move.
Hold the contraction position as you squeeze the bicep and then lower the single handle back down to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Switch arms while performing this exercise.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Start out by grabbing single handle next to the low pulley machine. Make sure you are far enough from the machine so that your arm is supporting the weight.
Make sure that your upper arm is stationary, perpendicular to the floor with elbows in and palms facing forward. Your non lifting arm should be grabbing your waist. This will allow you to keep your balance.
Slowly begin to curl the single handle upwards while keeping the upper arm stationary until your forearm touches your bicep while exhaling. Tip: Only the forearm should move.
Hold the contraction position as you squeeze the bicep and then lower the single handle back down to the starting position as you inhale.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Switch arms while performing this exercise.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Start out by grabbing single handle next to the Bajo pulley Máquina. Make sure you are far enough from the Máquina so that your arm is supporting the weight. Make sure that your upper arm is stationary, perpendicular to the Suelo with elbows in and palms facing forward. Your non lifting arm should be grabbing your waist. This will alBajo you to keep your balance. SBajoly begin to Curl the single handle upwards while keeping the upper arm stationary until your foPosteriorm touches your bicep while exhaling. Tip: Only the foPosteriorm should move. Hold the contraction position as you squeeze the bicep and then Bajoer the single handle Espalda down to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions. Switch arms while performing this exercise.

Bíceps.name: Bancada Inclinada con Mancuernas de Un Brazo de Pie
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand on the back side of an incline bench as if you were going to be a spotter for someone. Have a dumbbell in one hand and rest it across the incline bench with a supinated (palms up) grip.
Position your non lifting hand at the corner or side of the incline bench. The chest should be pressed against the top part of the incline and your feet should be pressed against the floor at a wide stance. This is the starting position.
While holding the upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell upward while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Switch arms while performing this exercise.
Bíceps.name_en: Standing One-Arm Dumbbell Curl Over Incline Bench
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Stand on the back side of an incline bench as if you were going to be a spotter for someone. Have a dumbbell in one hand and rest it across the incline bench with a supinated (palms up) grip.
Position your non lifting hand at the corner or side of the incline bench. The chest should be pressed against the top part of the incline and your feet should be pressed against the floor at a wide stance. This is the starting position.
While holding the upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell upward while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Switch arms while performing this exercise.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Stand on the Espalda Lateral of an Banca Inclinada as if you were going to be a spotter for someone. Have a Mancuerna in one hand and rest it across the Banca Inclinada with a supinated (palms up) grip. Position your non lifting hand at the corner or Lateral of the Banca Inclinada. The Pecho should be Pressed against the top part of the Inclinado and your feet should be Pressed against the Suelo at a wide stance. This is the starting position. While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the Mancuerna upward while contracting the Bíceps as you breathe out. Only the foPosteriorms should move. Continue the movement until your Bíceps are fully contracted and the Mancuerna is at Hombro level. Hold the contracted position for a second. SBajoly begin to bring the Mancuernas Espalda to starting position as your breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions. Switch arms while performing this exercise.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Predicador con Mancuernas de Dos Brazos
Bíceps.instructions:
Grab a dumbbell with each arm and place the upper arms on top of the preacher bench or the incline bench. The dumbbell should be held at shoulder length. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weights up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Grab a dumbbell with each arm and place the upper arms on top of the preacher bench or the incline bench. The dumbbell should be held at shoulder length. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you exhale, use the biceps to curl the weights up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Grab a Mancuerna with each arm and place the upper arms on top of the Predicador bench or the Banca Inclinada. The Mancuerna should be held at Hombro length. This will be your starting position. As you breathe in, sBajoly Bajoer the Mancuernas until your upper arm is extended and the Bíceps is fully stretched. As you exhale, use the Bíceps to Curl the weights up until your Bíceps is fully contracted and the Mancuernas are at Hombro height. Squeeze the Bíceps hard for a second at the contracted position and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Barra de Pie de Agarre Ancho
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with your torso upright while holding a barbell at the wide outer handle. The palm of your hands should be facing forward. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Slowly begin to bring the bar back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Stand up with your torso upright while holding a barbell at the wide outer handle. The palm of your hands should be facing forward. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arms stationary, curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Hold the contracted position for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Slowly begin to bring the bar back to starting position as your breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Stand up with your torso Vertical while holding a Barra at the wide outer handle. The palm of your hands should be facing forward. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting position. While holding the upper arms stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the Bíceps as you breathe out. Tip: Only the foPosteriorms should move. Continue the movement until your Bíceps are fully contracted and the bar is at Hombro level. Hold the contracted position for a second and squeeze the Bíceps hard. SBajoly begin to bring the bar Espalda to starting position as your breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl Zottman
Bíceps.instructions:
Stand up with your torso upright and a dumbbell in each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Make sure the palms of the hands are facing each other. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arm stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Your wrist should rotate so that you have a supinated (palms up) grip. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Now during the contracted position, rotate your wrist until you now have a pronated (palms facing down) grip with the thumb at a higher position than the pinky.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back down using the pronated grip.
As the dumbbells close your thighs, start rotating the wrist so that you go back to a neutral (palms facing your body) grip.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Stand up with your torso upright and a dumbbell in each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Make sure the palms of the hands are facing each other. This will be your starting position.
While holding the upper arm stationary, curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you breathe out. Only the forearms should move. Your wrist should rotate so that you have a supinated (palms up) grip. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Now during the contracted position, rotate your wrist until you now have a pronated (palms facing down) grip with the thumb at a higher position than the pinky.
Slowly begin to bring the dumbbells back down using the pronated grip.
As the dumbbells close your thighs, start rotating the wrist so that you go back to a neutral (palms facing your body) grip.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Stand up with your torso Vertical and a Mancuerna in each hand being held at arms length. The elbows should be close to the torso. Make sure the palms of the hands are facing each other. This will be your starting position. While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the Bíceps as you breathe out. Only the foPosteriorms should move. Your Muñeca should rotate so that you have a supinated (palms up) grip. Continue the movement until your Bíceps are fully contracted and the Mancuernas are at Hombro level. Hold the contracted position for a second as you squeeze the Bíceps. Now during the contracted position, rotate your Muñeca until you now have a pronated (palms facing down) grip with the thumb at a Altoer position than the pinky. SBajoly begin to bring the Mancuernas Espalda down using the pronated grip. As the Mancuernas close your tAltos, start rotating the Muñeca so that you go Espalda to a neutral (palms facing your body) grip. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Bíceps.name: Curl de Predicador Zottman
Bíceps.instructions:
Grab a dumbbell in each hand and place your upper arms on top of the preacher bench or the incline bench. The dumbbells should be held at shoulder height and the elbows should be flexed. Hold the dumbbells with the palms of your hands facing down. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells keeping the palms down until your upper arm is extended and your biceps are fully stretched.
Now rotate your wrists once you are at the bottom of the movement so that the palms of the hands are facing up.
As you exhale, use your biceps to curl the weights up until they are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger higher than the thumb.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and rotate your wrists so that the palms are facing down again.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_en:
Grab a dumbbell in each hand and place your upper arms on top of the preacher bench or the incline bench. The dumbbells should be held at shoulder height and the elbows should be flexed. Hold the dumbbells with the palms of your hands facing down. This will be your starting position.
As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells keeping the palms down until your upper arm is extended and your biceps are fully stretched.
Now rotate your wrists once you are at the bottom of the movement so that the palms of the hands are facing up.
As you exhale, use your biceps to curl the weights up until they are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger higher than the thumb.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted position and rotate your wrists so that the palms are facing down again.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Bíceps.instructions_es: Grab a Mancuerna in each hand and place your upper arms on top of the Predicador bench or the Banca Inclinada. The Mancuernas should be held at Hombro height and the elbows should be flexed. Hold the Mancuernas with the palms of your hands facing down. This will be your starting position. As you breathe in, sBajoly Bajoer the Mancuernas keeping the palms down until your upper arm is extended and your Bíceps are fully stretched. Now rotate your Muñecas once you are at the bottom of the movement so that the palms of the hands are facing up. As you exhale, use your Bíceps to Curl the weights up until they are fully contracted and the Mancuernas are at Hombro height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger Altoer than the thumb. Squeeze the Bíceps hard for a second at the contracted position and rotate your Muñecas so that the palms are facing down again. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Tobilleras
Gemelos.instructions:
Usa un objeto resistente como un soporte para sentadillas para sujetarte.
Levanta la pierna derecha en el aire (a unos 5 cm del suelo) y realiza un movimiento circular con el dedo gordo del pie. Finge que estás dibujando un gran círculo con él. Consejo: Un círculo equivale a 1 repetición. Respire normalmente mientras realiza el movimiento.
Cuando haya terminado con el pie derecho, repita con la pierna izquierda.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Use a sturdy object like a squat rack to hold yourself.
Lift the right leg in the air (just around 2 inches from the floor) and perform a circular motion with the big toe. Pretend that you are drawing a big circle with it. Tip: One circle equals 1 repetition. Breathe normally as you perform the movement.
When you are done with the right foot, then repeat with the left leg.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Use a sturdy object like a Sentadilla rack to hold yourself. Lift the right Pierna in the air (just around 2 inches from the Suelo) and perform a circular motion with the big toe. Pretend that you are drawing a big circle with it. Tip: One circle equals 1 repetition. Breathe normally as you perform the movement. When you are done with the right foot, then repeat with the left Pierna.

Gemelos.name: Rmn Tibial Anterior
Gemelos.instructions:
Comience sentado en el suelo con las piernas dobladas y los pies en el suelo.
Usando un rodillo muscular o un rodillo, aplique presión a los músculos de la parte exterior de las espinillas. Trabaje desde justo debajo de la rodilla hasta por encima del tobillo, haciendo una pausa en los puntos de tensión durante 10-30 segundos. Repite con la otra pierna.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Begin seated on the ground with your legs bent and your feet on the floor.
Using a Muscle Roller or a rolling pin, apply pressure to the muscles on the outside of your shins. Work from just below the knee to above the ankle, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repeat on the other leg.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Begin Sentado on the ground with your Piernas bent and your feet on the Suelo. Using a Muslo Roller or a rolling pin, apply Pressure to the Muslos on the outLateral of your shins. Work from just beBajo the knee to above the ankle, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repeat on the other Pierna.

Gemelos.name: Tablero de Equilibrio
Gemelos.instructions:
Coloque una tabla de equilibrio frente a usted.
Ponte de pie y trata de equilibrarte.
Mantenga el equilibrio durante el tiempo que desee.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Place a balance board in front of you.
Stand up on it and try to balance yourself.
Hold the balance for as long as desired.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Place a balance board in Frontal of you. Stand up on it and try to balance yourself. Hold the balance for as long as desired.

Gemelos.name: Barra Sentado Gemelo Elevación
Gemelos.instructions:
Place a block about 12 inches in front of a flat bench.
Sit on the bench and place the ball of your feet on the block.
Have someone place a barbell over your upper thighs about 3 inches above your knees and hold it there. This will be your starting position.
Raise up on your toes as high as possible as you squeeze the calves and as you breathe out.
After a second contraction, slowly go back to the starting position. Tip: To get maximum benefit stretch your calves as far as you can.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Place a block about 12 inches in front of a flat bench.
Sit on the bench and place the ball of your feet on the block.
Have someone place a barbell over your upper thighs about 3 inches above your knees and hold it there. This will be your starting position.
Raise up on your toes as high as possible as you squeeze the calves and as you breathe out.
After a second contraction, slowly go back to the starting position. Tip: To get maximum benefit stretch your calves as far as you can.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Place a Bloque about 12 inches in Frontal of a flat bench. Sit on the bench and place the ball of your feet on the Bloque. Have someone place a Barra over your upper tAltos about 3 inches above your knees and hold it there. This will be your starting position. Elevación up on your toes as Alto as possible as you squeeze the calves and as you breathe out. After a second contraction, sBajoly go Espalda to the starting position. Tip: To get maximum benefit stretch your calves as far as you can. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Prensa de Pantorrilla
Gemelos.instructions:
Adjust the seat so that your legs are only slightly bent in the start position. The balls of your feet should be firmly on the platform.
Select an appropriate weight, and grasp the handles. This will be your starting position.
Straighten the legs by extending the knees, just barely lifting the weight from the stack. Your ankle should be fully flexed, toes pointing up. Execute the movement by pressing downward through the balls of your feet as far as possible.
After a brief pause, reverse the motion and repeat.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Adjust the seat so that your legs are only slightly bent in the start position. The balls of your feet should be firmly on the platform.
Select an appropriate weight, and grasp the handles. This will be your starting position.
Straighten the legs by extending the knees, just barely lifting the weight from the stack. Your ankle should be fully flexed, toes pointing up. Execute the movement by pressing downward through the balls of your feet as far as possible.
After a brief pause, reverse the motion and repeat.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Adjust the seat so that your Piernas are only slightly bent in the start position. The balls of your feet should be firmly on the platform. Select an appropriate weight, and grasp the handles. This will be your starting position. Straighten the Piernas by extending the knees, just barely lifting the weight from the stack. Your ankle should be fully flexed, toes pointing up. Execute the movement by Pressing downward through the balls of your feet as far as possible. After a brief pause, Inverso the motion and repeat.

Gemelos.name: Prensa de Pantorrilla en la Máquina de Prensa de Piernas
Gemelos.instructions:
Using a leg press machine, sit down on the machine and place your legs on the platform directly in front of you at a medium (shoulder width) foot stance.
Lower the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and press the platform all the way up until your legs are fully extended in front of you without locking your knees. (Note: In some leg press units you can leave the safety bars on for increased safety. If your leg press unit allows for this, then this is the preferred method of performing the exercise.) Your torso and the legs should make perfect 90-degree angle. Now carefully place your toes and balls of your feet on the lower portion of the platform with the heels extending off. Toes should be facing forward, outwards or inwards as described at the beginning of the chapter. This will be your starting position.
Press on the platform by raising your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.name_en: Calf Press On The Leg Press Machine
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Using a leg press machine, sit down on the machine and place your legs on the platform directly in front of you at a medium (shoulder width) foot stance.
Lower the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and press the platform all the way up until your legs are fully extended in front of you without locking your knees. (Note: In some leg press units you can leave the safety bars on for increased safety. If your leg press unit allows for this, then this is the preferred method of performing the exercise.) Your torso and the legs should make perfect 90-degree angle. Now carefully place your toes and balls of your feet on the lower portion of the platform with the heels extending off. Toes should be facing forward, outwards or inwards as described at the beginning of the chapter. This will be your starting position.
Press on the platform by raising your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Using a Prensa de Piernas Máquina, sit down on the Máquina and place your Piernas on the platform directly in Frontal of you at a medium (Hombro width) foot stance. Bajoer the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and Press the platform all the way up until your Piernas are fully extended in Frontal of you without locking your knees. (Note: In some Prensa de Piernas units you can leave the safety bars on for increased safety. If your Prensa de Piernas unit alBajos for this, then this is the preferred method of performing the exercise.) Your torso and the Piernas should make perfect 90-degree angle. Now carefully place your toes and balls of your feet on the Bajoer portion of the platform with the heels extending off. Toes should be facing forward, outwards or inwards as described at the beginning of the chapter. This will be your starting position. Press on the platform by raising your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as Alto as possible and flexing your Gemelo. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go Espalda down. Go Espalda sBajoly to the starting position as you breathe in by Bajoering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Elevación de Gemelos con Mancuerna
Gemelos.instructions:
Hang on to a sturdy object for balance and stand on a dumbbell handle, preferably one with round plates so that it rolls as in this manner you have to work harder to stabilize yourself; thus increasing the effectiveness of the exercise.
Now roll your foot slightly forward so that you can get a nice stretch of the calf. This will be your starting position.
Lift the calf as you roll your foot over the top of the handle so that you get a full extension. Exhale during the execution of this movement. Contract the calf hard at the top and hold for a second. Tip: As you come up, roll the dumbbell slightly backward.
Now inhale as you roll the dumbbell slightly forward as you come down to get a better stretch.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Hang on to a sturdy object for balance and stand on a dumbbell handle, preferably one with round plates so that it rolls as in this manner you have to work harder to stabilize yourself; thus increasing the effectiveness of the exercise.
Now roll your foot slightly forward so that you can get a nice stretch of the calf. This will be your starting position.
Lift the calf as you roll your foot over the top of the handle so that you get a full extension. Exhale during the execution of this movement. Contract the calf hard at the top and hold for a second. Tip: As you come up, roll the dumbbell slightly backward.
Now inhale as you roll the dumbbell slightly forward as you come down to get a better stretch.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Colgado on to a sturdy object for balance and stand on a Mancuerna handle, preferably one with round Discos so that it rolls as in this manner you have to work harder to stabilize yourself; thus increasing the effectiveness of the exercise. Now roll your foot slightly forward so that you can get a nice stretch of the Gemelo. This will be your starting position. Lift the Gemelo as you roll your foot over the top of the handle so that you get a full Extensión. Exhale during the execution of this movement. Contract the Gemelo hard at the top and hold for a second. Tip: As you come up, roll the Mancuerna slightly Espaldaward. Now inhale as you roll the Mancuerna slightly forward as you come down to get a better stretch. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Gemelo Elevacións - With Bandas
Gemelos.instructions:
Grab an exercise band and stand on it with your toes making sure that the length of the band between the foot and the arms is the same for both sides.
While holding the handles of the band, raise the arms to the side of your head as if you were getting ready to perform a shoulder press. The palms should be facing forward with the elbows bent and to the sides. This movement will create tension on the band. This will be your starting position.
Keeping the hands by your shoulder, stand up on your toes as you exhale and contract the calves hard at the top of the movement.
After a one second contraction, slowly go back down to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Grab an exercise band and stand on it with your toes making sure that the length of the band between the foot and the arms is the same for both sides.
While holding the handles of the band, raise the arms to the side of your head as if you were getting ready to perform a shoulder press. The palms should be facing forward with the elbows bent and to the sides. This movement will create tension on the band. This will be your starting position.
Keeping the hands by your shoulder, stand up on your toes as you exhale and contract the calves hard at the top of the movement.
After a one second contraction, slowly go back down to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Grab an exercise Banda and stand on it with your toes making sure that the length of the Banda between the foot and the arms is the same for both Laterals. While holding the handles of the Banda, Elevación the arms to the Lateral of your head as if you were getting ready to perform a Press de Hombros. The palms should be facing forward with the elbows bent and to the Laterals. This movement will create tension on the Banda. This will be your starting position. Keeping the hands by your Hombro, stand up on your toes as you exhale and contract the calves hard at the top of the movement. After a one second contraction, sBajoly go Espalda down to the starting position. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Calf Stretch Hands Against Wall
Gemelos.instructions:
Stand facing a wall from several feet away. Stagger your stance, placing one foot forward.
Lean forward and rest your hands on the wall, keeping your heel, hip and head in a straight line.
Attempt to keep your heel on the ground. Hold for 10-20 seconds and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Stand facing a wall from several feet away. Stagger your stance, placing one foot forward.
Lean forward and rest your hands on the wall, keeping your heel, hip and head in a straight line.
Attempt to keep your heel on the ground. Hold for 10-20 seconds and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Stand facing a wall from several feet away. Stagger your stance, placing one foot forward. Lean forward and rest your hands on the wall, keeping your heel, Cadera and head in a straight line. Attempt to keep your heel on the ground. Hold for 10-20 seconds and then switch Laterals.

Gemelos.name: Elevaciones de Gemelo Tipo Burro
Gemelos.instructions:
For this exercise you will need access to a donkey calf raise machine. Start by positioning your lower back and hips under the padded lever provided. The tailbone area should be the one making contact with the pad.
Place both of your arms on the side handles and place the balls of your feet on the calf block with the heels extending off. Align the toes forward, inward or outward, depending on the area you wish to target, and straighten the knees without locking them. This will be your starting position.
Raise your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
For this exercise you will need access to a donkey calf raise machine. Start by positioning your lower back and hips under the padded lever provided. The tailbone area should be the one making contact with the pad.
Place both of your arms on the side handles and place the balls of your feet on the calf block with the heels extending off. Align the toes forward, inward or outward, depending on the area you wish to target, and straighten the knees without locking them. This will be your starting position.
Raise your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: For this exercise you will need access to a Burro Gemelo Elevación Máquina. Start by positioning your Bajoer Espalda and Caderas under the padded lever provided. The tailbone area should be the one making contact with the pad. Place both of your arms on the Lateral handles and place the balls of your feet on the Gemelo Bloque with the heels extending off. Align the toes forward, inward or outward, depending on the area you wish to target, and straighten the knees without locking them. This will be your starting position. Elevación your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as Alto as possible and flexing your Gemelo. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go Espalda down. Go Espalda sBajoly to the starting position as you breathe in by Bajoering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Mancuerna Sentado One-pierna Gemelo Elevación
Gemelos.instructions:
Place a block on the floor about 12 inches from a flat bench.
Sit on a flat bench and place a dumbbell on your upper left thigh about 3 inches above your knee.
Now place the ball of your left foot on the block. This will be your starting position.
Raise your toes up as high as possible as you exhale and you contract your calf muscle. Hold the contraction for a second.
Slowly return to the starting position, stretching as far down as possible.
Repeat for your prescribed number of repetitions and then repeat with the right leg.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Place a block on the floor about 12 inches from a flat bench.
Sit on a flat bench and place a dumbbell on your upper left thigh about 3 inches above your knee.
Now place the ball of your left foot on the block. This will be your starting position.
Raise your toes up as high as possible as you exhale and you contract your calf muscle. Hold the contraction for a second.
Slowly return to the starting position, stretching as far down as possible.
Repeat for your prescribed number of repetitions and then repeat with the right leg.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Place a Bloque on the Suelo about 12 inches from a flat bench. Sit on a flat bench and place a Mancuerna on your upper left tAlto about 3 inches above your knee. Now place the ball of your left foot on the Bloque. This will be your starting position. Elevación your toes up as Alto as possible as you exhale and you contract your Gemelo Muslo. Hold the contraction for a second. SBajoly return to the starting position, stretching as far down as possible. Repeat for your prescribed number of repetitions and then repeat with the right Pierna.

Gemelos.name: Foot-smr
Gemelos.instructions:
This exercise stretches the fascia of the muscles in the feet. Start off seated with your shoes removed. Using a foot roller or a similar object, such as a small section of pvc pipe, place your foot against the roller across the arch of your foot. This will be your starting position.
Press down firmly, rolling across the arch of your foot. Hold for 10-30 seconds, and then switch feet.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
This exercise stretches the fascia of the muscles in the feet. Start off seated with your shoes removed. Using a foot roller or a similar object, such as a small section of pvc pipe, place your foot against the roller across the arch of your foot. This will be your starting position.
Press down firmly, rolling across the arch of your foot. Hold for 10-30 seconds, and then switch feet.
Gemelos.instructions_es: This exercise stretches the fascia of the Muslos in the feet. Start off Sentado with your shoes removed. Using a foot roller or a similar object, such as a small section of pvc pipe, place your foot against the roller across the arch of your foot. This will be your starting position. Press down firmly, rolling across the arch of your foot. Hold for 10-30 seconds, and then switch feet.

Gemelos.name: Knee Circles
Gemelos.instructions:
Stand with your legs together and hands by your waist.
Now move your knees in a circular motion as you breathe normally.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Stand with your legs together and hands by your waist.
Now move your knees in a circular motion as you breathe normally.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Stand with your Piernas together and hands by your waist. Now move your knees in a circular motion as you breathe normally. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Peroneals-smr
Gemelos.instructions:
Lay on your side, supporting your weight on your forearm and on a foam roller placed on the outside of your lower leg. Your upper leg can either be on top of your lower leg, or you can cross it in front of you. This will be your starting position.
Raise your hips off of the ground and begin to roll from below the knee to above the ankle on the side of your leg, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repeat on the other leg.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Lay on your side, supporting your weight on your forearm and on a foam roller placed on the outside of your lower leg. Your upper leg can either be on top of your lower leg, or you can cross it in front of you. This will be your starting position.
Raise your hips off of the ground and begin to roll from below the knee to above the ankle on the side of your leg, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repeat on the other leg.
Gemelos.instructions_es: Lay on your Lateral, supporting your weight on your foPosteriorm and on a foam roller placed on the outLateral of your Bajoer Pierna. Your upper Pierna can either be on top of your Bajoer Pierna, or you can cross it in Frontal of you. This will be your starting position. Elevación your Caderas off of the ground and begin to roll from beBajo the knee to above the ankle on the Lateral of your Pierna, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repeat on the other Pierna.

Gemelos.name: Peroneals Stretch
Gemelos.instructions:
In a seated position, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting position.
With the leg extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is inverted, with the inside of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
In a seated position, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting position.
With the leg extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is inverted, with the inside of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_es: In a Sentado position, loop a belt, rope, or Banda around one foot. This will be your starting position. With the Pierna extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is inverted, with the inLateral of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch Laterals.

Gemelos.name: Posterior Tibialis Stretch
Gemelos.instructions:
In a seated position, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting position.
With the leg extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is everted, with the outside of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
In a seated position, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting position.
With the leg extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is everted, with the outside of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch sides.
Gemelos.instructions_es: In a Sentado position, loop a belt, rope, or Banda around one foot. This will be your starting position. With the Pierna extended and the heel off of the ground, pull on the belt so that the foot is everted, with the outLateral of the foot being pulled towards you. Hold for 10-20 seconds, and then switch Laterals.

Gemelos.name: Rocking de Pie Gemelo Elevación
Gemelos.instructions:
This exercise is best performed inside a squat rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place it on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck).
Hold on to the bar using both arms at each side and lift it off the rack by first pushing with your legs and at the same time straightening your torso.
Step away from the rack and position your legs using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Keep your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance. Also maintain a straight back and keep the knees with a slight bend; never locked. This will be your starting position.
Raise your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending (other than the slight initial bend we created during positioning) at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back slowly to the starting position as you breathe in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Now lift your toes by contracting the tibia muscles in the front of the calves as you breathe out.
Hold for a second and bring them back down as you breathe in.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
This exercise is best performed inside a squat rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place it on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck).

Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place it on the Espalda of your Hombros (slightly beBajo the neck). Hold on to the bar using both arms at each Lateral and lift it off the rack by first pushing with your Piernas and at the same time straightening your torso. Also maintain a straight Espalda and keep the knees with a slight bend; never locked. This will be your starting position. Elevación your heels as you breathe out by extending your ankles as Alto as possible and flexing your Gemelo. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending (other than the slight initial bend we created during positioning) at any time. Hold the contracted position by a second before you start to go Espalda down. Go Espalda sBajoly to the starting position as you breathe in by Bajoering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched. Now lift your toes by contracting the tibia Muslos in the Frontal of the calves as you breathe out. Hold for a second and bring them Espalda down as you breathe in. Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

Gemelos.name: Sentado Gemelo Elevación
Gemelos.instructions:
Sit on the machine and place your toes on the lower portion of the platform provided with the heels extending off. Choose the toe positioning of your choice (forward, in, or out) as per the beginning of this chapter.
Place your lower thighs under the lever pad, which will need to be adjusted according to the height of your thighs. Now place your hands on top of the lever pad in order to prevent it from slipping forward.
Lift the lever slightly by pushing your heels up and release the safety bar. This will be your starting position.
Slowly lower your heels by bending at the ankles until the calves are fully stretched. Inhale as you perform this movement.
Raise the heels by extending the ankles as high as possible as you contract the calves and breathe out. Hold the top contraction for a second.
Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Gemelos.instructions_en:
Sit on the machine and place your toes on the lower portion of the platform provided with the heels extending off. Choose the toe positioning of your choice (forward, in, or out) as per the beginning of this chapter.
Place your lower thighs under the lever pad, which will need to be adjusted according to the height of your thighs. Now place your hands on top of the lever pad in order to prevent it from slipping forward.
